campaign.story:
** ALL our physical Reward Tiers include FREE US SHIPPING. You will NOT be charged extra when you choose a reward if you are in the US! **
Covers A & B, by Lucas Santos (art) and Nimesh Morarji (colors)
 An ancient power rises once again and it is up to an unlikely hero and his friends to save the world from this dark evil force that threatens to consume and destroy all life on Earth!
Celestial Falcon is a coming of age superhero story dealing with supernatural forces that challenge this group of friends to become more than they ever thought possible: heroes.
People who love Superhero stories.
People who love stories with supernatural themes and action.
If you love sharks, you're going to LOVE this issue.
Fans of coming of age stories where characters go on epic journeys and face seemingly insurmountable obstacles.
People who don't like character-driven stories.
Those that don't root for the underdog.
People that don't like twists on popular themes and plots told in refreshing ways.
Uncool people that don't like sharks in their comics!
Mr. "Mac" MacKenzie
 Celestial Falcon #2 is a 32-page standard American size single issue comic book printed on high quality paper.
This is an extra-sized issue with 26 pages of story! No filler here!
There are four covers for Celestial Falcon #2, including a JAWS homage variant and a Celestial vs. Megalodon Battle variant! Not to mention the two main covers, both of which ALL physical level backers will receive! Our rewards are stacked!
All backers will receive extra bonus content throughout the campaign, including stickers, prints, digital comics and more!
Need to add something to your pledge? We've got you covered! Just add the amount below to your pledge and message us to let us know what you added!
CELESTIAL FALCON #1 COVER A - $5
CELESTIAL FALCON #1 COVER B - $5
CELESTIAL FALCON #1 COVER C - $8
CELESTIAL FALCON #1 COVER D - $15
CELESTIAL FALCON #1 COVER E - $10
CELESTIAL FALCON #2 COVER A - $5
CELESTIAL FALCON #2 COVER B - $5
CELESTIAL FALCON #2 COVER C - $15
CELESTIAL FALCON #2 COVER D - $18
CELESTIAL FALCON ANGEL TEE - $25
THE LAST EMBER #1: REFORGED - $8
LAST EMBER PRESS MUG - $15
LAST EMBER PRESS HAT - $25
If you are JUST wanting the FOIL Battle Variant cover of the comic, we just added this brand new tier for you!
Progress sequence of Cover B, the hero within!
Cover C by Laura Rimaszombati & Cover D by Linnéa
MILESTONES UNLOCKED!
- We reached 100 Backers, so ALL Backers will get a FREE digital copy of Will Allred's Diary of Night Volume 1 added to their pledge!
- We reached 50% funding, so ALL Backers will get a FREE digital copy of Clay Adams' Deadskins #1 added to their pledge!
 - We hit 75+ Backers, so everyone gets a digital copy of Jack Holder's The Following Caseworkwith art by our own Lucas Santos!
- We reached over 33% funding, so ALL Physical Level Backers get this print by Laura Rimaszombati, who also did the Jaws variant above!
- We hit over 100 Project Followers, so ALL backers get a digital copy of Russell Nohelty's Ichabod Jones #1 added to their pledge!
- We reached 65 backers, so the Celestial vs. Megalodon Battle Variant is being upgraded to FOIL for all backers getting that cover!
- We reached 50 backers, so ALL backers get a digital copy of HEALED #1 by George O'Connor and Griffin Ess!
At one of our higher reward tier, you will find The Celestial Crate, which is has been updated to include ALL the covers for issues #1 AND #2! 
It's also chock-full of everything else you find in this campaign, including variant covers, stickers, posters, additional comics and more!
 The Celestial Crate is a limited edition collector's box, get them while they last!
There's also a new very limited tier where you can get The Celestial Crate AND an original digital commission by series artist Lucas Santos!
Chris is a YouTuber and lifelong comic book and Superman fan. He has been writing stories for half his life, and now gets to live out his dream seeing his creations in print. Celestial Falcon is his first comic book.
Brant is the Co-Publisher of Last Ember Press and writer of The Last Ember series. He has also been lettering comics for the better part of two decades, with work published through Image Comics, Action Lab Entertainment, Arcana, Moonstone, AC Comics and more. Celestial Falcon is his first foray into full-on co-writing a project.
 Check out this interview I did with Bill Coulombe on his Under the Mask Podcast!
And this one with Matt Kund on his Constructing Comics Podcast:
Lucas is a 2D and 3D artist developing artwork for comic books, and concept art for the entertainment industry. He is the series artist for Celestial Falcon and creator of the fan comic Spider-Cop. https://www.artstation.com/lulisluc
Nimesh can be found coloring for Indies and self-publishing comics. He lives in the top vacation spot, Portugal. When I’m… oops…. I mean, when he’s not coloring comics he usually is watching movies/Tv Shows or enjoying the family and reading comics.
                He can be reached at social medias under @nimesh.art.
Clay is an actor, writer and director, best known for his animation voice-over work and as a co-creator for FRIED Comics. An alum of the Comics Experience lettering course, he currently letters the book RED XMAS for FRIED. You can read his work for free at friedcomics.com/free"
VARIANT COVER ARTISTS:
Linnéa (Celestial vs. Megalodon Variant Cover Artist) @Papurrcat 
Laura Rimaszombati (JAWS Homage Variant Cover Artist) @laura_rimaszombati
"Very professionally done. Well done, guys."
~ JLS Comics
"I'm really excited for the ride and where it's going to go!"
~ Comic Uno
Issue one of Celestial Falcon was completely self-funded. We then came to Kickstarter with a Deluxe Edition of that issue with a new back-up story and additional content, which was successfully funded and has shipped out to our backers.
We are dedicated and committed to this story and will release it whether it gets funded or not, it will just take longer without Kickstarter. 
 For Last Ember Press, Kickstarter has played an integral role in our business, having successfully funded 7 previous campaigns to date. We love the community on this platform, and we value your pre-orders and contributions toward seeing our projects birthed and completed. We truly couldn't do this without you.
By helping us accomplish this goal, we will be able to complete issue 2 in a timely fashion and continue growing this series right here on Kickstarter with you!
We'll be using the funds raised in this campaign to complete the art on this issue, as well as get it printed and shipped out to all our backers! Any additional funds will go right back into production for future issues! Here's the general breakdown:
Check out these killer pages straight from the issue! Plans are made, threats are encountered and secrets are revealed!
The Characters
 We Care About Our Products 
And we know you do too! That's why we make sure they are as safe as possible, bagged and boarded, and inserted inside Gemini Comic Supply Comic Flash Mailers to protect your investment!
Additional smaller rewards, if applicable, will be secured in bubble envelopes and placed inside the mailers with the comics.
The Celestial Crate will be bubble wrapped and then inserted into another shipping box so that it is not damaged either.
If you have decided to join us on this journey, THANK YOU sincerely from the entire creative team of Celestial Falcon and everyone at Last Ember Press and Shooting Star Universe.
We are already working on the rest of the issue, and once it funds we'll kick that into high gear so we can get it into your hands sooner.
If you haven't decided yet, scroll back through the page, and if you're a fan of SUPERHEROES, SHARKS, SUPERNATURAL VILLAINS and FUN, COMING OF AGE stories, please show your support by backing this campaign!
If you have backed it, consider spreading the word so more people like you can find it!
You can direct your friends to CELESTIALFALCON.COM/ks2 or use one of these links:
Share on Facebook
Share on Twitter
Thanks!
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
We realize how risky backing a project can be, so we want to alleviate that concern.

Last Ember Press has successfully funded 7 previous campaigns, 5 of which are fulfilled, 1 is in the process as I type this (books are shipping to our HQ now), and 1 is having the art finished up currently. We have delivered and often over-delivered on our promises at the end of the day and will continue to do so.

LEP and SSU are in this for the long haul. We are passionate and dedicated to completing quality books and getting them in the hands of our readers.

As for Celestial Falcon #2, while the book is not yet done, we have continued working on it leading up to and are still working on it during this campaign in order to get it completed as quickly as possible. We have also given ourselves some buffer room this time in case things do get delayed, so that you can expect to receive your rewards in the estimated time frame detailed on the page above and in the rewards.

We value your support and know that at any given time there are a number of other projects you could be backing instead of ours. We greatly and deeply appreciate you choosing to put your support with us on Celestial Falcon #2.

So really, the only risk is missing out on an awesome project should you choose not to support it. Otherwise, we know you will be pleased with the process and the final product!

Should you have any further concerns, you can message us directly here on Kickstarter or email me at brant@lastemberpress.com.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

updates.update_content:
Hey all,
In case you missed it, we DID relaunch the campaign last Wednesday, and weFUNDED IN 5 HOURS!
Today, we've announced Stretch Goals!

updates.update_userinfo: The Relaunch Got Project We Love!
updates.update_content:
Hey all!
Guess what? Well, if you read the title of the post, I'm sure you've already guessed it.
THE RELAUNCH GOT PROJECT WE LOVE!

Hey everyone!
We are relaunching VERY SOON now. The page just got approved last night, so go click the green button at the link below to GET NOTIFIED when we do launch!
CelestialFalcon.com/take2
WHY DIGITAL?
Just waiting to get approved...

Hey everyone,
As you know, we did not reach our funding goal this time, but we came very close! And that's all thanks to all of you!
We're bummed it didn't fund, but at the same time, we are thrilled that we reached more people and more funding than the previous issue, so we are counting that as a win!
WHAT'S NEXT?

Man, we are so pumped about all of you that have come out in support today, thank you SO MUCH! It means the world to us.
We realize we still have a long way to go in a very short time, but we're not slowing down!
Add-On Menu

With just HOURS to go, we've reached 100 backers!
To celebrate, we're unlocking another...
MILESTONE BONUS!
For hitting 100 backers, we are adding Will Allred's Diary of Night Volume 1 to our growing Digital Bundle!

Hey everyone!
Less than 48 hours to go and we hit the halfway mark! There's still plenty of time and we're still pushing forward!
That said, if we don't make it, know that we have a backup plan, and a backup backup plan! So this book will get made!
50% Milestone Unlocked!

You may or may not have noticed, but yesterday we added a brand new reward tier!
Now you can choose either Cover A OR Cover B!

project_data.project_name: Celestial Falcon #1-2: Supernatural Warfare, Superhero Style

campaign.story:
In 2018, we launched Kinetic, the story about a young man, Johnny,  who developed superpowers, and thought he could do a better job than his city's resident hero.
Johnny is able to create and manipulate kinetic energy.  He's the first person born with superpowers.  The city's current hero, The Ascender, was patrolling the skies in a metal suit (like Iron Man).  After Johnny's brother got hurt by a psychopath, and the Ascender chose not to intervene, or even help, Johnny decided that he could do a better job, and became KINETIC.
Well, after two years, eight issues, and thousands of books sold online and at conventions, he's beat the bad guy, mastered his powers, and got the girl.
NOW WHAT?!
Kinetic: Identities #1 picks up where the story left off.  When a villain from his past is up to his old tricks, it's up to Johnny to save the day!
But is Kinetic a match for the villains when this time, they're ready for him?!
If you are a card-carrying Kinetic VIP, welcome back!  But if this is your first time hearing about this series, don't worry, I've got you covered.  You don't have to have know anything to read and enjoy this issue, and I've also got plenty of catch-up tiers to get you up to speed.
Three Main Covers to Choose from!
I get emails, messages, and even mail to my PO Box all the time asking me when there will be more Kinetic. 
I'm happy to know the answer: RIGHT NOW.
There are even more awesome rewards further down the page, but here's a sneak peak at a couple of our reward tiers for backers:
At some of  our higher tiers, we also have rare and Kickstarter exclusive rewards, such as Physical Scripts, and these Ultra-Limited Black and White Variants:
Ultra-Limited - ONLY 30 available!
This is the first time Kinetic is being offered internationally, but also, ALL ORDERS SHIPPED IN THE USA HAVE FREE SHIPPING!
I've also got a few other fun surprises up my sleeve as the campaign moves forward...
Though I'm the writer and creator, Kinetic wouldn't be able to happen without the help of my entire creative team!  They should get all the accolades for how great this book looks!  Here's a little about me, and the rest of the creative team:
This book wouldn't be able to happen without the help of my wonderful creative team, and I am proud to call them collaborators and friends!
Since my very first time behind a booth at my first comic convention, Kinetic has built up a dedicated fanbase...
And a few reviewers, and industry professionals have had some nice things to say, too!
There's been a little hiatus since the last Kinetic book released.  We've had to deal with losing an artist and finding a replacement.  Thankfully, we found a wonderful talent in indie comic veteran Luis Rivera.  I met him at a convention, and hit it off immediately.  With Luis onboard, we could get started again.  I am proud to say that, except for Rafael, the creative team remains completely unchanged!
I just had to tell more of Kinetic's story.  Like so many of you, I've also fallen in love with the world of Velo City, and I knew Johnny's tale wasn't over yet.
We're coming back to Kickstarter because my first campaign was so successful, and I want to keep sharing Kinetic with this wonderful community.  Since joining Kickstarter as a backer, I've helped over 50 creators by backing their projects and make their dreams come true.  Kickstarter really is the place you want to find the newest and freshest comics!
Since last year, we've been running the gauntlet with 2020.  So why now?  Well, with so much going on in the world, the best way I feel that I can help is to continue offering up awesome comics to you.  A sense of normalcy is important in turbulent times, even if it's just a little getaway time away from the madness.
The funds raised here will be used to fund the print run of Kinetic, Identities #1, and shipping those books to you.
If we're lucky enough to overfund, we'll put that towards making more great comics.
 I would never ask you to back something that I wasn't 100% sure we could completely finish in a timely manner.  The artwork is almost totally done for this book, and I think Luis and Omi did a great job:
Now, you may notice a few characters are unfinished.  Astute eye, my diligent reader! For the first time ever, we are offering to have you (or a loved one!) DRAWN INTO KINETIC!  You can either be a citizen saved by Kinetic (and help him try to catch the bad guys) OR become a nefarious GOON.
Find out more about that, and a ton of other fun reward tiers, below...


Here's the plan:
This is the first campaign I have run where our custom reward tiers (being drawn into the story) actually mean the art is almost entirely done.  I'm factoring in extra time it will take Luis, Omi, and Lucas to have high end backers drawn in the story.  I doubt it will take as long, BUT I'd rather estimate a long time and get you the book ahead of schedule than the other way around.
Here's what our timeline looks like:
Again, I think this timeline is the worst case scenario.  I'd rather estimate a longer time period, and deliver early, than the other way around.
I want to get these books into your hands as fast as possible. 
We've gotten our fair share of comics that arrived mangled by the mail carrier.
You pay premium prices on Kickstarter, and you deserve better. That's why we've started using Gemini Comic Mailers:
These babies are sturdy. They require a little more money, a little more time (and a lot more tape!) but it's worth it to make sure your comics arrive in pristine condition.
And if somehow your comic still gets roughed up?
I'll replace it free of charge.

Thank you for checking out this Kickstarter!  Kinetic would not be possible without the support of the wonderful fans, and I appreciate you giving me the chance to make my dreams of becoming a comic book writer a reality!
Now, I'm going to ask you to look over our awesome reward tiers, find the one you like best, and let's get Kinetic: Identitites #1 in YOUR hands!
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
One of the best parts about working on Kinetic, Volume 1 was it let me get a lot of the inconsistencies and mistakes out of my system. This book is nearly complete: all that's needed now to finish the art is to add in any likenesses from the higher end reward tiers, and then send it to the printer. My last Kickstarter fulfilled before it's estimated time, and I will do my best to fulfill this campaign early, as well.

With the uncertainties in the world, mainly shipping delays due to COVID, we have added a healthy buffer in the timeframe to account for any delays. We've also estimated very, VERY conservatively for how long it will take to finish artwork and print the books.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

campaign.story:
See Stretch Goals added below. 
Random Original Art Give-Away are randomly inserted into a print reward that is shipped.
1st Random Original Art Give-Away art by Kevin Leen
2nd Random Original Art Give-Away art by Kevin Leen on ODD MUSINGS Show
3rd Random Original Art Give-Away art by Kevin Leen POPXP! Show
 4th Radom Original Art Give-Away art by Kevin Leen was shown on the SkyStorm Universe Sanctum episode 2 currently on YouTube search SkyStorm Universe
 An immense stone of extraordinary power held the layers of time in sync from the instant the universe itself was created. 
The stone was placed outside the time stream by the Time Lords who watched over and protected the stone throughout eternity.
That was the plan.
Until it was that some of the Time Lords desired the stone for themselves and caused the stone to be shattered into shards and scattered throughout history. But not before they escaped and vanished to scheme anew.
The banished time lord Marta assembled her own group of villainous Rogues to find the time lost shards, promising them wealth and power beyond imagining. However, what greater power could they imagine but the Time Stone itself?
Chronos and the other Time Lords sent forth their own guardian Agents who were given the task of finding each shard in the hope once the stone was pieced back together, it would set time back into balance before eternity itself ceased to exist.
And so began The PARADOX WARS…
Time Agents Tamara Rose and Christiana Blood land in a future where steam engines and dinosaurs roam the land. They discover Marta even has a presence in this time recruiting more to her band of rogues and the importance of a dormant volcano and how it will help them get back to their home base of Infinity... if it still exists.
For over 25 years, we’ve brought you the adventures of the heroes and villains of the Skystorm Universe and now with this Kickstarter, we bring it all together in Paradox Wars: Shattered Time. 
As we launch our first Kickstarter campaign for Paradox Wars the art and coloring is done we just need to wrap up the lettering. 
Then off to print, package and ship but... that’s where YOU are needed!
Printing and shipping is expensive and a major cost of this project. We need your support to get this issue of Paradox Wars to you!
ADD-ONS
Instead of trying to figure out every combination of rewards that a true fan might need we offer ADD-ONS. If you see something from the campaign that isn’t included with your selected reward tier just send us a message here in Kickstarter and we’ll be happy to assist you with your add-ons during the campaign via  “over-pledge”.
Example: PARADOX WARS: SHATTERED TIME #1 ARTIST EDITION can be added to any existing tier that doesn’t include it for $19 additional (plus shipping where applicable).
International backer we’ll work with you on your add-ons to get you the best shipping rated.
QUESTIONS
Do you have any questions? Many of the common questions asked on Kickstarter are answered in the FAQ section of our campaign, just click on the FAQ tab. If after checking out the FAQ section you still need help with a question feel free to send us a message on this Kickstarter page and we’ll get back to you asap.
Wait a minute how do you send us a question? 
To send a message look near the top fo this campaign page, under our video and to the right, you’ll see a clickable link that says “CONTACT ME”. Click and a pop-up appears to allow you to send us a message.
BACKER SUPPORT ACCESS
Need help? Just get in touch!
We will do our best to get back to you within 24 hours. Most times much sooner.
Computer: Click on my photo at the top of the campaign.
A window will pop-up “About the creator” scroll to the bottom and hit the “contact me” blue button.
iOS APP: Click the photo/name and on the next screen hit “contact”.
ANDROID APP: Doesn’t offer direct creator messaging. If you need to reach us please email at robert@skystormuniverse.com.
VERY IMPORTANT NOTICE: Please do not make “Add-On” request on the Comments Page of this projects Kickstarter. Send us a Direct Message instead. Please. 
Thank You.
To back Paradox Wars: Shattered Time #1, click on the green button to the right of our video. Kickstarter will ask for a pledge amount and your reward selection.
If you don’t have a Kickstarter account they have made it very simple. You can even do it through Facebook.
Also, please add a link to our Kickstarter page to your blog and website. Sharing this project with others will go a long way toward getting Paradox Wars: Shattered Time #1 funded. Thank you so much.
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
When it comes to timely shipping and fulfillment, we believe that we have it covered. We have access to a shipping department that has over 30 years of experience shipping art supplies and video games daily. 
All the creative is nearly complete. Just throw some lettering on these pages and we’re off to the races.
Our printing partners are secured, our budgets are complete, the shipping supplies are in the warehouse and our manpower is lined up. 

We just have to print, receive, prepare, assemble, pack, and ship.

We have done two of these before without any problems and look forward to creating many more in the future.

Having published and shipped comic books and magazines for over 25 years through comic distributors and directly to comic shops and having owned an art supply company has given us the edge on working with many different vendors and sources at one time so pledges will not be a problem. 

We prep and ship in an ultra-clean environment. We will make sure all your rewards are delivered as promised, packed securely. 

We take every phase of our campaign, including shipping, quite seriously. 

You can count on this: whether we any problems or not, we will be in communication with you during the entire process and update you in a timely manner. 

We want to assure you that we don’t take your trust for granted, the printing, assembling, packing, and shipping of these items in a top-notch manner is equally important to us. 

In conclusion, I’d like to thank all the readers, backers, and collectors who have jumped on the ride with us. Hang on to something you’re going to need it cause this adventure is going to be one heck of a ride.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

updates.update_userinfo: Paradox Wars Shattered Time #1 Digital Comic
updates.update_content:
We expect to begin shipping Paradox Wars Shattered Time #1 within the next two weeks. We ran into a few small problems so we had a few items reprinted. Once they are in the shop we'll begin shipping. 
Because of the delay, I wanted to give everyone another gift for supporting and waiting this extra time so we had a special HellGirl mini-comic printed that previews the first 8 pages of HellGirl Demonsong #1. HellGirl Demonsong will be out next Kickstarter project and she appears in Paradox Wars #2 titled Paradox Wars Infinite Hell coming next summer/fall.  Print supporters will receive a printed mini-comic and digital supporters will receive the digital version.

First off Hi
It's been a couple of crazy weeks. When we went to print the comic bundles we found out that the print files were corrupted and also the backups. So I have spent many evenings and days recreating the print files for all 21 comics. Finding the actually colored pages, resizing, and tweaking. But the good news is that everything is being printed and all the stretch rewards are in the house.

We're on the back end of wrapping the lettering and now looking at the coloring I've decided to take a little time and tweak it just a little. No major delays. All stretch goals (free items) have been sent to be printed or manufactured. The button samples look great.

campaign.story:
ABOUT US
We are Aedan, Skye, and Asher Peterson, and we're beyond excited to tell you about our new project, Wake Low. After years of touring, releasing solo music, studying art, producing, and collaborating on the NAMO record, we've finally decided to dive into something we've put off for far too long. We've been making music here in Nashville for most of our lives, but we've never made a record just the three of us... until now!
Asher's a drummer, engineer, and record producer. Aedan's a visual artist, musician, and songwriter. Skye's a singer/songwriter with two EPs and a few tours under her belt. Thanks to COVID-19 we found ourselves grounded in Nashville with time to make music together. On the day of our first official band meeting, a massive storm pounded Nashville, followed by a rush of damaging winds. The next day, the meteorologists said that it was a weather phenomenon called a "wake low"--a rush of wind after a storm, caused by a spike in temperature. Thus, a band was born. The concept for the record was born, too.
 We know there's a lot of darkness in the world. Right now, we feel like our calling is making beautiful art, and writing good, true songs.
Our goal is to record a twelve-song, self-produced album. We spent weeks in quarantine planning this record and writing the songs together, and we're super excited about the opportunity to make them as beautiful as we can and share them with the world. We've already been in contact with some of our dream engineers and players, and we can't wait to show you what we're working on! To give you an idea of the sonic landscape we're aiming for, some of our influences right now include The National, Brandon Flowers, Better Oblivion Community Center, Ethan Gruska, S. Carey, M83, and Tyson Motsenbocker. If we can get close to the way those artists make us feel, we'll be happy.
BUDGET
We thought a lot about this campaign, and the number we've landed on is $16,000. This is a LOT of money. But we feel confident that with this budget, we can make a really great sounding record. With this goal, we'll be able to bring in some of our favorite musicians and engineers in Nashville work on this album.
IJM
Here's the awesome part. Although we can't give any funds raised on kickstarter directly to a charity, once the campaign is finished and the record is out, we'll be giving 100% of Wake Low's profits for a year to an organization we love called International Justice Mission. IJM is a non-profit that works around the globe rescuing victims of human trafficking. We're so excited for the opportunity to try to use music as a means to help vulnerable men, women, and children in need. Check out IJM's website here!
REWARDS
If you can help us, we've come up with some super fun Wake Low rewards. Here are some of the things we'll be offering:
Stickers
CDs
T-Shirts
Prints
Hand-written Lyrics
Check out the reward tiers in the "Support" section!
HOW TO HELP
The best way to help is to either pledge here on this page, or share this campaign on social media! You can also follow us on Instagram and Spotify through these links:
Wake Low - Instagram
Skye Peterson - Instagram, Spotify
NAMO - Instagram, Spotify
Thank you so much for supporting us. We can't wait to share this album with you!
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
Making the music is the fun part! The biggest challenge will be raising the funds. Lots of planning has gone into this project, and we feel very confident. You can help by sharing this page and telling your friends about our campaign!
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

updates.update_content:
We did it!! Our debut album is out on all platforms today. We worked super hard on this album with some super talented people, so roll down your windows, go on a drive, and give it a listen! We couldn't have done it without you (look below for album credits).

Every cent we make from this music for the next YEAR will be going towards fighting human trafficking through IJM. So we need your help spreading the word! You can help by sharing this link on social media!

The third single from our record is out today! It's called "Green Light," and we hope you enjoy it!  All Wake Low profits for the next year will be going to IJM, so stream away! You can help us out by following us on Instagram, Spotify, and streaming the song here.
Huge thanks to these people for being a part of it -

Vocals/acoustic - Aedan Peterson

Hey, all!
The second single from our record is out today! We had had so much fun making this one, and we hope you enjoy it! You can help us out by following us on Instagram, Spotify, and streaming the song here.
Huge thanks to these people for being a part of it -

Thanks for all the kind words about "How Did We Get Here"! We've been so overwhelmed by you guys. The next single, "Testify", will release into the world on 10/2, but we're sending it to you guys early! This link is for your ears only, so be sure to keep it to yourselves. Hope you enjoy!
Testify
In the meantime, go ahead and follow us on Spotify/Instagram to stay updated. Thanks for all of your support!

Hey, all!
The first single from our record is out today thanks to you! We're proud of this song, and we're excited for it to be out in the world. You can help us out by following us on Instagram, Spotify, and streaming the song here!
Huge thanks to these amazing people for being a part of it - Brandon Owens, Sean Carey, Tyler Burkum, Craig Alvin, Joe Hutchinson.

We did it! We're beyond excited about this project, and we're so thankful for all of you that supported us!
In order for us to get you your appropriate rewards, we'll need a very small amount of information from you. Keep an eye out for a survey email from me! It'll take less than a minute, and we won't be able to send you your pledge if it doesn't get filled out. So hop on it!

campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
Renegade Game Studios is an experienced publisher of board games. While Renegade is only 6 years old, it is composed of industry veterans including Scott Gaeta, President of Renegade, with over 20 years of experience in all aspects of the industry.

While there are always risks associated with any campaign, we will make sure that we communicate any delays or challenges we may experience along the way. We are already past many of the hurdles that can delay a project and do not expect any major delays. If we do, they will likely be in shipping and we will give you regular and detailed updates regarding any shipping issues.

Thank you for supporting our project!

Find out more about Renegade Game Studios at www.renegadegames.com
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

updates.update_userinfo: Fulfillment Update, Renegade Con & Raiders of the North Sea Collector's Box!
updates.update_content:
Hello Puzzle Fans!
Are you ready to puzzle?! The puzzles have all made their way to our shipping hubs and will begin shipping to you by the end of this month! We are SO excited for you to get these new puzzles to your table so you can enjoy our games in a whole new way! You will get a shipping notification with a tracking number in your email when your puzzles ship, so be sure to watch for it in your Kickstarter-connected email address.
Join us for Renegade Con - October 9-11!

Hi Puzzlers, 
The time is almost here! The puzzles have begun to arrive at our shipping hubs this week, which means the next step is to get your new puzzled shipped to your front door! Our shipping partner is prepared to begin fulfillment in the next week or two and we expect many of you will have your puzzles by the end of the month. 
Now is the time to contact us with any address changes if you have moved or need your reward shipped somewhere different. We have a small window of time that we can make changes for you, so please email any address changes to .

updates.update_userinfo: Puzzle talk during Gen Con Online!
updates.update_content:
Hi Puzzlers! 
We wanted to just touch base with you to let you know that your puzzles will be arriving to our shipping hubs VERY soon, so we are on schedule to begin fulfillment next month! 
A few weeks ago we had the opportunity to talk about the new jigsaw puzzles during a panel we did for Gen Con Online! Check out the clip below, and you can watch the whole video here to hear what else is down the pipeline from Renegade Game Studios!

updates.update_userinfo: First look! Sneak Peek at the Overlight puzzle in action!
updates.update_content:
Hi Puzzlers!
We've got some good news and something fun to share with you today!
The good news first...
Your puzzles are on a boat and on their way to our fulfillment centers! What does that mean for you? It means we are on track for the September fulfillment timeline!

updates.update_userinfo: FINAL CHANCE to fill out your pledge survey!
updates.update_content:
Hi Puzzlers!
Our CrowdOx pledge manager was supposed to close yesterday, but we decided to give you a few extra days to fill it out. The pledge manager will now be closing on Thursday. If you have not completed your survey, please fill it out now! We don't want you to miss out on getting your puzzles, and if you don't complete your survey so we can ship your puzzles to you!

updates.update_userinfo: Puzzle Unboxing - Early Sample First Look!
updates.update_content:
Hi Puzzle Fans!
Things are moving fast and the puzzle production is already nearing completion! Check out this video from our factory, opening up the box to show you what's inside, including the puzzle, the reference poster to help you build your puzzle (so you don't have to squint at the box), and the plastic bag to hold the pieces. It'll be no time before you'll be able to enjoy these on your table!

updates.update_userinfo: PLEDGE MANAGER OPEN! Finalize your pledge & add-ons before July 14th!
updates.update_content:
Hey puzzle fans!
We have teamed up with the people over at Crowd Ox to send you an extremely simple survey in order to collect the info we need to fulfill your rewards and process payment for shipping. This is where you will select the puzzles you want for the Pick One and Pick Two pledge levels. You will also be able to order additional puzzles here.  
Please finalize your pledge now - the entire process should only take a couple of minutes to complete.

updates.update_userinfo: Next Steps for The Puzzle Kickstarter!
updates.update_content:
Hello all! Thank you again for supporting this project and our first foray into the world of puzzles!
As of right now, Kickstarter is processing the pledge, charging all who backed. Once that process is done (we're anticipating that it will take a few days) we'll launch the Pledge Manager through CrowdOx. 
At that point, you'll get an email from CrowdOx with a link to access your pledge.

updates.update_userinfo: FUNDED! Thank you for your support!
updates.update_content:
With your help, we did it!
We're down to the final hours and we did it! We hit the funding goal and these beautiful puzzles will be made a reality! They're so beautiful and feature the art of some incredible artists, and we can't wait to bring joy to your table in a whole new way with them!

campaign.story:
Original Cover (A)
 
Spectress & Sabanion is a supernatural horror story about Aneksi, the ghost of Cleopatra's top assassin.  Aneksi has lived as a ghost for centuries and has learned to rejoin the world of the living.  She is at the cusp of finding purpose in her unlife in the modern world of the living.  But she is bound by an ancient curse to a demon named Sabanion.  As Aneksi pushes more into the world of the living, she must drag Sabanion with her.  
There's nothing quite like Spectress & Sabanion, but if you enjoy fast pacing, tension, mystery and the macabre (Hellraiser, Immortal Hulk, Justice League Dark, the works of Cullen Bunn) this is the book for you!
A unique story incorporating ghosts, Egyptian mythology, magic, demons, Delta Force operators, exorcists and more.
32 interior pages of intense, full-color art.
Inside paper is glossy 70 lb text.  Cover is 85 lb glossy.
KICKSTARTER EXCLUSIVE Cover (B)
Now that we have reached our funding goal, here are some sweet extra Stretch Goals to give you even more cool stuff! 
 Spectress & Sabanion Logo Sticker
 The RED 10 Digital Comic: The continuing story of Oxymoron! A 48-page tale of the killer obsessed with contradiction!
A Moon Crew Design Sticker
A Double-Sided Spectress & Sabanion Bookmark
 Raised Gloss UV on the Kickstarter Original Cover!
 When we hit these funding milestones, ALL BACKERS will get these extra rewards! 
All 3 Milestone Bonuses.... UNLOCKED!

I'm launching this Kickstarter because the idea keeps up at night.  I love the characters, I love ancient Egyptian mythology,  and I love gritty stories.  I've always wanted to tell engage other people with the bizarre tales that bounce around in my skull. 
I also want to tell stories about people that serve in uniform.  Not a u-rah-rah but from a closer, more personal perspective that doesn't come through in movies or pop culture.
   
              Kickstarter is an amazing platform where I hope to reach a larger audience.  I want more people to enjoy this gritty escape into a world of magic, murk, victory and tragedy.   Covid-19 has halted the convention schedule this year, I want to offer comic book fans that independent creator experience.  


              The funds we raise through this campaign will be used to pay for the printing and shipping of the book, as well as cover Kickstarter fees and some art costs. Here's the breakdown of how it will be allocated:
CLICK THE PIC TO SEE WHAT'S STILL AVAILABLE!




Here's my timeline for getting the books printed and shipped out to you, step by step. We're looking to wrap up fulfillment by early November!
 July 3rd - Campaign Ends
 July 18th - Estimated Time Funds Will be Received from Kickstarter
 Late July - Files Will be Sent to the Printer
 August-September - Books are Printed and Shipped to Me for Final Delivery
 Mid-October - Expected Delivery to US Backers
 Early November - Expected Delivery to International Backers
 
              Thanks so much for your support.  As an independent creator, I depend on the support of people willing to think outside the box.  Thank you for taking a chance on a different kind of story.  I appreciate your support!
Please have a look at the various tiers and select you pledge level.  Thanks again!
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
Cover A for the book has already been published. There is a chance that factors related to Covid-19 could delay printing. I have confirmed with 2 separate publishers that they are open for business. These businesses (PrintNinja, Comic Impressions) are both reliable and known throughout the comics community as being dependable and providing a top notch product. 

As a Kickstarter backer myself, I know how much it means to ask you to support a first-time launcher with your hard earned money, especially in today's unsure times. I've made every effort to minimize any risk to you as a potential backer before launching this campaign.

This campaign is my first Kickstarter, so I cannot claim to be an expert. I've made every effort to educate myself, including attending the ComixLaunch Course for creating a successful Kickstarter campaign.

This project means a lot to me and I think the story has tremendous potential. I certainly plan on Kickstarting Issue #2, Issue #3 and so on... my goal is to make sure that every backer leaves this experience completely satisfied and eager for the next issue of Spectress & Sabanion.

If you have any questions or concerns, please feel free to message me. I want your involvement in my project to be as rewarding as possible. 

Thank you again for your time and support.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

support.title: Digital PDF
support.descp:
The DIGITAL PDF version of Spectress & Sabanion Issue #1. It's the story of Aneksi, the ghost of Cleopatra's top assassin. She's lived into the modern era and learned to rejoin the world of the living. She's created an identity for herself and yearns to find purpose as an archaeologist. An ancient curse binds her fate to a demon named Sabanion. She must free him from a prison for supernatural threats called CONFAC-4. Will everything go according to plan... or will the Moon Crew pay the price?
INCLUDES:
SPECTRESS & SABANION #1 Digital PDF

support.title: Digital Plus - Issues #1 and Preview #0
support.descp:
The DIGITAL PLUS PDF includes the supernatural, brutal story of SPECTRESS & SABANION as well as ISSUE #0 SPECTRESS. This preview issue is a 12 page story of SPECTRESS getting a taste of the life she dreams of. She joins a team of tough archaeologists on an all-guns-blazing mission to recover stolen artifacts from ISIS terrorists! This 12 page adventure is in beautiful black and white, drawn by the amazing Sajad Shah.
INCLUDES:
SPECTRESS & SABANION #1 Digital PDF
SPECTRESS #0 Preview Issue PDF

support.title: Pharaoh's Scroll Digital Deluxe Edition
support.descp:
The DIGITAL DELUXE EDITION adds 5 fully completed pages from Issue #2 of SPECTRESS & SABANION. How smoothly does Spectress's jailbreak plan go? The Exorcists that guard CONFAC-4 aren't about to let a demon leave without a fight. Also includes a script sample and rough pages from Issue #3... how far will they make it? Will Cheska, the friend of Spectress's alter ego, be there to help when she's needed? But that's not all! I'm also throwing in some script pages for a supernatural gangster story I'm also working on that features vampires, demons, and lawyers. Al Capone doesn't like being ripped off and sends his vampire hitter to fix things in CHICAGO OVERCOAT. A PDF bonanza of supernatural horror!
INCLUDES:
SPECTRESS & SABANION #1 Digital PDF
SPECTRESS #0 Preview Issue PDF
5 Color Digital Preview Pages of SPECTRESS & SABANION #2
SPECTRESS & SABANION #3 Digital Script & Rough Pages

updates.update_userinfo: If you haven't gotten in yet, TONIGHT IS THE TIME!
updates.update_content:
Issue #2 has been launched!  It's on it's way!
If you haven't backed already, you can get a METALLIC SKETCH CARD - FREE!
Join cover artist Mog Park and I for a Facebook Live Stream tonight at 10 PM Central Time (8 PM Pacific).  She will be sketching live.
ANYONE WHO BACKS OR ADDS ON WHILE WE'RE LIVE WILL GET A FREE METALLIC SKETCH CARD W/ YOUR CHOICE OF

We're at it again!
Spectress & Sabanion Issue #2 launches in less than 3 hours (6 PM Central Time)!  I'm having a Facebook LIVE virtual pre-launch part that starts at 5 PM Central Time.

Issue #2 Launches Next Week, Oct 27th at 6:00PM CST!!
How have you enjoyed your books so far?  I hope the bloody adventures of Aneksi, Sorn, Sabanion, Cooper, and Shepard have entertained you, but honestly....  IT'S ONLY JUST STARTED!!!

updates.update_userinfo: And that's a WRAP! Everything has been shipped! Now... to look forward!
updates.update_content:
The Chris Ehnot sketch covers are in the mail!  
They look fantastic, and he also numbered them from 1 to 9.  So cool.  

And, without a moment to loose, we get started on the next one!  That's right, the Kickstarter launch for Issue #2 is coming up October 27th!

updates.update_userinfo: Almost there on the remarked covers!
updates.update_content:
Chris Ehnot is still cranking out the sketch covers!
They're coming along nicely, I should have them soon!  Here are a few samples:

In the survey, I forgot to ask if you want your comic book signed! I was planning on signing them all...
And I will!
BUT... if you absolutely DO NOT WANT A SIGNATURE on your book that is completely OK.  Reply to me ASAP on his update or via a Kickstarter message or email me at kurtzauer@gmail.com and your copy will be sent without a signature.

Almost there!  Packing and shipping this week.  I've only received 26 out of 44 responses so far, so please check your email or account for the survey that asks for your delivery information.  I want to get you your stuff ASAP!  The new printer worked out and I can get everything out much earlier than planned!
Hope you're all doing well and thanks again!

THE BOOKS HAVE ARRIVED!
I was originally planning on using Print Ninja for printing, but that's around a 2 month turn around time so I went with Comic Impressions... right here, stateside.  Sooo much quicker and top notch quality.  I've had a look and they turned out to be spectacular.  Can't wait to get them to you!
So what happens now?

I just received the funds from Kickstarter.  BOOM, let's make this happen!  Digital only backers have received their surveys and links to their digital rewards.  Thank you!  If you are still interested in a physical reward, send me a note and we can get you whatever you want via PayPal.
Now it's time to get the ball rolling on getting out the physical rewards!  This week, I'll be putting in orders for:

project_data.project_name: Spectress & Sabanion #1 - A Supernatural Horror/Hero Series

campaign.story:
Born into the outcast breed of werewolves known as the Monoki, eighteen-year-old Rodney Marcelli is reluctantly thrown into an ancient war between good and evil in today's world where the line has blurred. With the help of Snow Paw, the Pureblood Monoki, and the supernatural evil slayer, Night Hunter, Rod must learn to master his newly found lycanthropy and mysterious kinetic energy power that only he possesses. Rod must fight the Dark Covenant in order to avenge his friends and family, and to save the girl he loves from the master vampire, Lord Malice. Rodney Marcelli is Night Wolf!
Do You Like LEGO® Mini-Figures?
If you are a LEGO® fan then this will excite you! You can now get your hands on a LIMITED EDITION CUSTOM NIGHT WOLF MINI-FIGURE as an add-on to any Physical Pledge level! Just add $25 to any Physical Pledge level, now or through Backerkit! However, these figures are limited to only 100 backers and they are going fast, so reserve yours ASAP!
Who Will Love Night Wolf?
Fans of Supernatural, Buffy the Vampire Slayer, Underworld, and other anti-hero monster horror stories.
People who like stories that encompass elements of horror, magic, and science  in a modern setting.
Collectors of high quality modern independent comic books from an amazing team of up-and-comers!
If you like unique takes on the horror, supernatural, theology, mythology, and fantasy genres.
If you love stories about supernatural beings like werewolves,  vampires, demons, witches, zombies and more then this is THE COMIC BOOK FOR YOU!

Critics, Pros, & Fans Are Absolutely Howling About Night Wolf! Here's What People are Saying...
“Night Wolf is a high octane werewolf story filled with supernatural thrills, bloody action, and high school angst that never forgets to be fun.” - Kevin Joseph (Creator/Writer, Tart)
“This is just pure action fun...terrific book!” - Chuck Pineau (Reviewer, Chuck's Raw Reviews)
“You will not be disappointed when you read Night Wolf. It’s awesome!” - Michael Eakins (Reviewer, Comic Watch)
“The story does build up suspense and gets you feeling like your watching a horror movie.” - Richard Vasseur (Reviewer, First Comics News)
Since the release of Night Wolf Issue 1 I've been traveling to comic cons around the North East of the United States meeting people and introducing them to Night Wolf. The Wolf Pack is constantly growing in numbers, and we need you! Will you be the next member to join?
Here's What Wolf Pack Members are Saying...
“I read the first issue of his comic I immediately fell in love...” - Eddie Garcia
“Finally, we’ve got a good story with a werewolf as the main hero! So, I’m very exited!” - Alexandr Gutnikov
“I'm hooked! If you're a fan of the classic monsters then this series is for you.” - Anthony Lamberti
“Extremely well written and absolutely amazing artwork! - Steven Beltzer
“I love this comic. Can't wait to read another!" - Frederick Knight 
Hi, I'm Robert A. Multari, but you can call me Rob. It’s been my dream since I was a kid, struggling with Attention Deficit Disorder and Dyslexia, to be in the comic book business. Comic books helped me learn how to deal with my learning disability. When I was 14-years-old, I wrote fan fiction for the X-Men and submitted it to Marvel in hopes that Stan Lee would read it. Someone from Marvel was nice enough to write back to me saying that Stan loves to hear from his fans and encouraged me to keep up my writing. As naive as I was at the time, it spread my passion for the business like a wild fire and inspired me to go to art school at Edinboro University of Pennsylvania, where I graduated with a Bachelor of Fine Arts Degree in Applied Media Arts. I have been working on Night Wolf since I was 16-years-old. The story and the characters have grown up with me, evolving into the amazing tale that it is today.
Why a werewolf comic book? Well, I have always loved any werewolf or supernatural related entertainment in movies, video games, etc. I didn't feel like there were any comic books out there doing werewolves any justice, so I decided to make a comic book based on a werewolf anti-hero myself. In high school, after I started developing Night Wolf, I got into Werewolf: The Apocalypse is a role-playing game by White Wolf Publishing.  I love the artwork in the game guides so much that I longed for them to put out a comic book to build on their world. Unfortunately, it never happened, but the artwork heavily influenced how I like my werewolves should look in my comics.
Carlos Herrera is a Professional illustrator residing in Santiago City, Chile. His amazing portfolio of artwork spans not only from his Chilean home but from abroad as well. Carlos specializes in heroic fantasy illustrations, comic book illustrations, and educational illustrations for schoolbooks. Carlos's talent stretches across various types of media and color illustration. He uses both traditional media meaning pencil, watercolor, graphite, acrylic, and more as well as digital media in use of a Wacom Tablet and Adobe Photoshop. Carlos graduated from Arcos Institute with the highest marks possible. For a long period of time Carlos was an active member of the Illustrator staff for the Salo S.A. Company's trading card game "Myths and Legends". Carlos is the illustrator for Night Wolf Issue 4. He also did the Night Wolf character designs, the full spread cover and the first 5 pages of issue 1, the illustration for the Night Wolf Issue 2 Variant Cover, and did all the art for the variant cover for issue 3 featuring Snow Paw.
Gat Melvyn is a digital colorist living in Johannesburg, South Africa. He has a Bachelor of Arts in Motion Picture Medium. He has done coloring work for Big Dog Ink and Image Comics. Gat is taking on the role of colorist for the Night Wolf series, starting with issue 3.  He is also the colorist on the Keystone Comic Con Exclusive Night Wolf Issue 1 Cover and the rare variant cover for Night Wolf Issue 4, penciled by Chris Williams and the new very limited variant cover of Night Wolf Issue 2, illustrated by Vincenzo Sansone.
Oscar Choquecota Ale is a professional illustrator residing in Lima, Perú. His amazing portfolio of artwork spans not only from his Peruvian home but from abroad as well. Oscar specializes in heroic, fantasy, anime, and comic book illustrations as well as video game concept development. Oscar's talent stretches across various types of media and color  illustration. His digital media tools of trade is a Wacom Tablet and  Adobe Photoshop. Oscar, owner of Bokuman Studio, is an illustrator with over 10 years experience. Oscar is the illustrator of Night Wolf Issues 1 - 3.
Ross A. Campbell is a Professional Digital Colorist residing in Elgin, Scotland. His amazing portfolio of artwork spans not only from his native home in the United Kingdom, but from abroad as well. Ross has had no formal art school training, but is self-taught with an unbelievably natural eye for colors, lighting, and shadow creating amazing depth of space within the 2D realm. He has been in the business for over 5 years primarily working as a comic book colorist, with the occasional full illustration job. Ross's works include mostly the fantasy genre, but also dabbles in other genres as well. His color weapons of choice are the Wacom Tablet and Adobe Photoshop. Some of Ross's clientele include DC, Action Lab, Image, Dynamite, Aspen, Top Cow, Sideshow, Zenescope, PKMM Entertainment, and Scout Comics. Ross did the colors for Night Wolf Issue 1 where Carlos left off, and he also colored the Night Wolf Issue 2 Variant Cover.
Chris Williams is a comic artist, writer and creator. After earning his BA in Animation & Media Arts in 2008 from the Art Institute of Philadelphia, Chris has sold many commissioned & contracted works locally and internationally. Some of his notable published works include cover art for Big Dog Ink (BDI)'s "Critter" & "Penny For Your Soul", Kenzer & Co.'s “Knights of The Dinner Table”, Markosia's "Geek-Girl", Source Point Press' "Salvagers" & "Franklin & Ghost", as well as promotional art for award-winning photographer, Nick Saglimbeni and his SlickForce Girl site. Chris is currently working on his creator owned comic series, "SUMMONS", among other upcoming indie titles. Chris is the illustrator of the Keystone Comic Con exclusive cover of Night Wolf Issue 1 and the rare variant cover for Night Wolf Issue 4.
Joseph Schmalke is a comics creator, writer, and illustrator residing in Westbrook, Maine. Joe is the writer/artist on several horror comics— including THE ELECTRIC BLACK, THE CALAMITOUS BLACK DEVILS, THE INFERNAL PACT, and CHERRY BLACKBIRD. He is also the writer and co-creator of the role-playing dark comedy MURDER HOBO. A lifelong lover of comic books and horror movies, he has worked behind the scenes in film and tv but has always focused on making the type of books that he loves to read— full of dark humor and dark themes. You can find his work featured on variant covers for Image comics, Boom! studios, Vault comics, IDW, Mad Cave, and Scout comics.  You will also find his artwork on Exclusive Marvel and FYE t-shirts, Super 7 /Killer Bootlegs’ card art, and A Sound of Thunder’s IT WAS METAL graphic novel anthology. Joseph is the artist of the new limited variant cover of Night Wolf Issue 1.
Conor Hughes's breakout work has been the popular Kickstarter comic White Ash. Previous to that he was one of the winners of the Millarworld art contest as well as being published in the Anthology Graphic Canon and Twisted Savage Dragon Funnies. You can troll him on twitch where he can often be found making comics as well as Hopewell NJ, with his amazing wife and giggle monster baby girl. Conor is the artist of a new limited variant cover of Night Wolf Issue 4.
Sean Forney is an eighteen year professional illustrator/comic book artist currently working on cover art for Lady Death (Coffin Comics), Marvel Premier sketch cards (Upper Deck), DudeBro (Spicy Pulp Comics), Lyaxia (Alcyone Studios), and his creator-owned comic Scarlet Huntress. Sean also works as a colorist for Counterpoint Comics for multiple titles including Tiggomverse, Hardlee Thinn, Notti & Nyce, Savage Eve, and Do You Pooh? Published cover work includes Vampirella Red Sonja (Dynamite), Totally Rad Wars (Totally Rad), Pestilence (Aftershock), Franklin & Ghost (SourcePoint Press), Bloodstrike (Image), Go West (Alterna), TMNT (IDW), and Back to the Future (IDW). Cover and interior work can be seen in Lark’s Killer, Black Flame Archives, Lord of Gore, and Zen: Intergalactic Ninja (Devil’s Due/1First), Delta Dawn (Corgi Press), and multiple titles for Zenescope Entertainment. Sean has also worked on commercial art for Tire Discounters, Red Roof Inn, Cut the Rope (Titan Publishing), Lego, Inc., My Adventures with Spider-Man (Marvel/Identity Direct), and the Bakugan toy line for Spin Master. Sean co-created and self-publishes the Scarlet Huntress series. is the artist of the new limited homage to John Byrne's X-Men 141 variant cover of Night Wolf Issue 2.
Dirk I. Tiede works as a professional artist, illustrator and teacher in the Boston area. He holds a BFA in commercial art from Millikin University, and has been drawing comics for as long as he can remember. Paradigm Shift is his labor of love, his magnum opus. He began it as an online comic in 1999, and was a founding contributor to premium comics portal ModernTales.com. His artwork has been showcased in the books Toon Art: The Graphic Art of Digital Cartooning and Webcomics, appeared the documentary Adventures In Digital Comics, and was featured in Season 3 of NBC’s Heroes. Dirk is the artist of a new limited variant cover of Night Wolf Issue 4.
Dan Ekis is an American comic artist and writer best known for creating the series Odyssey, Inc. and Soul of the World on Webtoons. He also draws the popular webcomic Tested for the New York Department of Health AIDS Institute YGetIt? Project. The comic has been featured on Webtoons. Dan currently works as a freelance illustrator doing commissions for various clients from his studio in Pittsburgh. He studied animation at Edinboro University of Pennsylvania, where he received a B.F.A. in Applied Media Arts. Dan is the artist of the very limited variant cover of Night Wolf Issue 1.
Vincenzo Sansone is an illustrator from in Pisa, Italy. He has a BA in Italian Literature at the University of Pisa and a professional degree at International School of Comics. He’s been working for several publishers such as Approbation Comics, Dead Canary Comics, Interweb comics, Moonstone books and Evoluzione publishing. Vincenzo is the artist of the very limited variant cover of Night Wolf Issue 2.
We're coming to you to raise funds to print Night Wolf Issue 3.  I have already invested my own time and money to ensure that the book is 100% complete and ready to go to print. I've come back to Kickstarter to help get the book into as many hands as possible in order to continue publishing this incredible series.
I’ve personally backed several Independent Comic projects  on Kickstarter because I believe that Indie Creators have great stories that need to be told. I believe that Kickstarter is a powerful tool to help creators, like myself, to bring our characters to life for everyone to enjoy.
By joining the wolf pack and backing this project, you will not only be helping to making sure that this book is printed. You will also receive the Kickstarter exclusive rewards and bonuses.
The Kickstarter Campaign: June 24 - July 14, 2020
Kickstarter Funds Received: July 29, 2020
Night Wolf Issue 3 off to Print: July 29, 2020
Merchandise in Production: Mid August 2020
Book Manufacturing and Freight: End August 2020
Expected Deliver to US Backers: Mid September 2020
Expected Deliver for INT Backers: End September 2020
As a Kickstarter Superbacker and a life time comic book collector, I know there's nothing worse than backing a comic project and then having your rewards arrive damaged. Therefore, all comics shipped will be individually bagged with boards, and will be secured in Gemini Comic Supply Comic Flash Mailers, which provides impact-resistant protection.
Orders with multiple comics will be sandwich packed and secured for additional protection. The Mystery Boxes will be BUBBLE WRAPPED before being inserted into a second shipping box, so that it arrives in great condition.
Furthermore, for this campaign, I will be handling fulfillment 100% in-house. I want to make sure that everything arrives to you as quickly as possible and limit the possibility of unforeseen delays, which is why I will be rolling up my sleeves to personally overseeing fulfillment for every backer.
I would like to personally thank you in advance for backing this project and joining the Wolf Pack! I’m extremely grateful for where I am now since publishing Night Wolf Issues 1 through 3. When this project is fully funded the next chapter of the Night Wolf series will be unveiled to the world, advancing my creative career to the next level!
 What's Next? Join the Wolf Pack Today! 
You've made it this far into the wolf's den, so what are waiting for? Join the Wolf Pack today! Scroll back up this page, choose a howling reward, and pledge to be a part of this campaign today. Again, thank you, for taking this creative journey with me. I appreciate so it so much!
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
I'm a relatively new creator and Night Wolf is my first comic book series. In April of 2016, I launched a failed Kickstarter campaign for Night Wolf Issues 1-3. I played the game on hard, setting a $20,000 goal. However, I did manage to raise $5,064 from my 74 backers, unfortunately Kickstarter is all or nothing. At the time I only had the character designs, a cover and 5 sequential pages during that launch. Even though the Kickstarter didn’t fund I was bound and determined to publish my story. Because I didn’t have the funds to finish the first issue, I decided to raise the money on my own doing freelance web design work to pay for the artwork. 

After self-publishing Night Wolf Issues 1 and 2, I launched another Kickstarter in October 2019 to print Night Wolf Issues 3 with a more reasonable funding goal of $5,000. The campaign successfully over funded, thanks to the amazing 217 backers that I refer to as my Wolf Pack. Now I'm back and ready for round 3 to print Night Wolf Issue 4.

I know it seems like there's a lot going on all over the world right now that is very stressful for us all. Collecting, reading, and creating comics books have always been an escape from the stressful things in my life. My hope is that by creating my comics books and putting them out into the world for you to enjoy also helps to relieve some of your stress as well. And that is what I am laser focused on doing!

In addition, I have been educating myself through the Comixlaunch course, which is a Kickstarter training program created by Tyler James. Tyler is the Publisher of ComixTribe and has successfully funded over 17 Kickstarter campaigns. Through the ComixLaunch community I have also been a part of a ComixLaunch Mastermind group of independent creators that have all ran successful campaigns in the past, and I've spent time learning and being mentored by them.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

updates.update_userinfo: Last Chance To Join the Latest Hunt!
updates.update_content:
Happy Werewolf Wednesday my Wolf Pack!
The Night Wolf #1-5: Urban Fantasy Werewolf Coming-of-Age Drama Kickstarter is surpassing my every expectation. Thanks to you amazing Wolf Pack members, we are over 203% funded with 478 pack members strong and growing! We have also unlocked 12 free Milestone Bonus Rewards and 5 Stretch Goals so far!

updates.update_userinfo: Exclusive Gift For All Returning Pack Members!
updates.update_content:
Good day my Wolf Pack!
In case you have missed the announcement, the Night Wolf #1-5: Urban Fantasy Werewolf Coming-of-Age Drama Kickstarter is live and already 86% funded with 258 pack members strong! That means we have unlocked 7 of the FREE Milestone Bonus Rewards! The Night Wolf #1-4 campaign is the highest backed Kickstarter that the Wolf Pack has hunted together at 414. I would love to break that record with this new campaign! We need your help getting to 500 plus Wolf Pack members strong! Take a look below at what you will already be getting for taking up the hunt with us, and there are still plenty more rewards to be unlocked!

Good day my Wolf Pack!
I would like to thank those of you who participated in the survey from my last update! Right now, I would like to share the winners of the four poll style questions that you voted your opinions on. Here are the results of those four poll questions, and the survey says...

Good afternoon my Wolf Pack! I hope you are having a great start to your week!
Yesterday, I sent out an update to the Night Wolf Volume 1 Kickstarter pack members informing them that my printer rep, Sam, estimates that the books won't be ready to ship from the printer until the end of April. The reason being is that a custom book like the die cut hard cover is going to take more time and attention. Since the Night Wolf Volume 1 trade paperback fulfillment is behind schedule, it is also throwing off my Night Wolf Issue 5 (a Spring launch) and Snow Paw Issue 1 (a Summer launch) Kickstarter dates as well. If you recall from my last update the Night Wolf Issue 5 prelaunch page is already live, and the issue is almost finished. Below is a Wolf Pack member exclusive sneak peek of the finished Night Wolf Issue 5 cover by Carlos Herrera! As you can imagine from seeing this amazing cover, I am super excited to get this book out into your hands as soon as possible.

updates.update_userinfo: Night Wolf Issue 5 Updates & Sneak Peeks!
updates.update_content:
Happy Werewolf Wednesday and St. Patrick's Day my Wolf Pack!
I hope you are having a great week so far! This week has been a crazy one for me! I have so many fires burning right now it’s getting a little rough to manage them all! Fear not, I work well under pressure! I've been trying to keep busy while I wait for the Night Wolf Volume 1 trade paperbacks to arrive from the printer. Otherwise, I would drive myself crazy.

updates.update_userinfo: Less Than Twelves Hours Left To Join the Hunt!
updates.update_content:
Good afternoon my Wolf Pack! 
The Night Wolf Volume 1: Urban Fantasy Werewolf Coming of Age Drama only has less than 12 hours left! The Kickstarter has been backed by 265 Wolf Pack members and we are currently at 261% funded! We've unlocked 8 FREE Milestone Rewards and 4 FREE Stretch Goals, and there are more Milestone Rewards and Stretch Goals waiting to be unlocked! Even though the clock is counting down, there is still time to take up the hunt if you haven't backed the Kickstarter yet. There are a plenty of exclusive freebies included with all of the pledge levels, so don't miss out on those!

updates.update_userinfo: Want To Score Some Awesome Night Wolf Swag?!
updates.update_content:
Good day my pack mate! 
I hope you are having a great Thursday! I'm happy to announce that we are only 34 backers way from unlocking the 8th FREE Milestone reward! We are also just over halfway from unlocking the 4th Stretch Goal, the Kevin Joseph 4 page addition to chapter 4! To celebrate, I wanted to give a FREE Thanksgiving Bonus Reward bundle of 12 Digital Comics from awesome indie creators, as a thank you gift to EVERY WOLF PACK MEMBER who backs at any reward level by Sunday, November 8th at 11:59pm EST!

updates.update_userinfo: How many heroes does it take to screw in a light bulb?
updates.update_content:
Good evening my Wolf Pack!
I hope you had a great weekend and a Happy Halloween! I had a great one with my family. We live a small neighborhood so the kids were able to enjoy a Socially Distanced Trick or Treating on Saturday, and on Sunday we celebrated my daughter's 3rd birthday with our immediate family members. The Night Wolf Volume 1 Kickstarter had a great weekend as well! Over the weekend the Wolf Pack unlocked both the 7th Milestone Reward, Wolf Pack Logo 4x3" Die Cut Sticker, and the 3rd Stretch Goal! The next stretch goal on deck is adding added to Chapter 4 of the print editions of the Night Wolf Volume 1 trade paperbacks!

updates.update_userinfo: Don't Miss Out On This Halloween Treat!
updates.update_content:
Happy Halloween my Wolf Pack! 
Did you know that tonight is a rare Halloween 'Blue Moon'? A Halloween full moon visible for most time zones on Earth hasn't happened since 1944, and it won't happen again until 2039! What a spooky treat for us all! Speaking of treats, you don't want to miss out on is the Exclusive Halloween Treat!

updates.update_userinfo: LEGOs and Witches and Werewolves, oh my! Plus a Halloween Treat!
updates.update_content: Good afternoon my Wolf Pack mate! The Night Wolf Volume 1 Trade Paperback Kickstarter Campaign had an amazing first week! The Wolf Pack fully funded the campaign, clawed down five milestone, and unlocked the first stretch goal all in one week! Unreal! Now, the hunt is far from over! The Wolf Pack is only two backers away from unlocking the sixth Milestone reward and hunting down Stretch Goal number two! To celebrate here is an Exclusive Halloween Treat!

campaign.story:
Hey there, thanks for stopping by, we're into the final week of the campaign.  We're looking to help secure funding towards completing the art and printing costs for Digitopia Issue 2.  
Watch the 'What is Digitopia?' trailer
PLAY

Digitopia is a pre-apocalyptic action adventure story of a father and daughter trying to survive in a civilisation that is imploding, where everyone from the army, society and bounty hunters are out to get them. 
We tackle some pretty hard hitting issues in these books including 
the rise of the hard right
fake wars and the brutality of the state
fake news and what drives media biases 
all encapsulated in a super high adrenaline action adventure - think 'The Matrix' meets 'The Running Man'.  
...and it's on Kickstarter till the 28th June.
Why is this comic book so important right now?
In many ways Digitopia explores a lot of the issues that we are facing today.
See any parallels between this book and the real world?
You don't have to look to the other side of the world to see these things, this is happening in our own Western culture, these things are happening now - if we don't make a stand against this, it will only get worse.

But will backing a comic book make a change?
It won't solve everything, but you're sending out a signal 
that we want new content, 
we want content that speaks to our problems and 
 we want content that challenges the status quo not reinforces it.
The number of books that we ask the printer to order will be based on the number of backers we get in this campaign.
If these are issues that you care aboutand want to be part of a change then please back this project today.
Stretch Goal 3 Unlocked: Extra Digital Comic Bundle also included with your reward
We're really happy to announce that since we have past the £2k mark we can unlock our third stretch goal, this super bundle of extra digital comics is now included with your selected reward tier, thanks to my friends at ComixTribe for providing these books.  
This is in addition to the first two stretch goals also being unlocked.  
Announcement: Stretch Goal 1 Now Unlocked
We're very happy to announce that we have passed our first stretch goal!
All these digital books will be added to your reward - regardless of which tier you backed at.
Now you will get these three amazing digital books added to your reward, whichever tier you back at  - absolutely free!
Thanks to my friends at Comix Tribe and Comix Launch for organising these.  
Announcement: Stretch Goal 2 Now Unlocked
We're really happy to announce that we passed our second stretch goal of getting to 100 backers!  This Exclusively Designed Digital Phone Wallpaper Pack will also be added to your selected reward tier.  
Want to see the Art Work?
Here's some pages from Digitopia 1 - these are all complete
page 1 of Digitopia Issue 1
page 2 of Digitopia Issue 1
page 3 of Digitopia Issue 1
These are the work in progress pages from Issue 2 of Digitopia - this is where we need your help to complete the art for issue 2.  
This is a truly multi-dimensional story, we're so pleased with how it's coming together
We're about half way through the inks on Digitopia 2.0
You can see in here the themes married with outstanding art work make this a really special project to be part of
If you love action adventure comics you are going to love Digitopia.  
Issue 1 is all ready, we are looking to complete issue 2 over the coming months.  
This campaign is for both
backers who are new to the series and 
backers who are already on-board with issue 1.
What others are saying about Digitopia
We were overwhelmed by all the critical acclaim we received for Digitopia 1.0.  
'I've been writing for almost two decades now, I can say without wanting to boast in anyway, that Digitopia 2.0 is the best of piece of writing I've ever done - working with a pro comics editor, has taken this script to a whole new level.  
The art team have taken that script even further than I thought possible - this is set to be one of this year's truly outstanding books' - Farhan Qureshi, writer of Digitopia.  
Specially crafted rewards just for you
We have lots of amazing rewards for you.  
 Paperback versions of the book - starts at £6 for issue 2
Get the paperback version of issue 2 (mock up is of issue 1 as we haven't yet created issue 2 yet, we can do with you help :)

Prefer Digital?  We've prepared a special Digitopia 1.0 + Digitopia 2.0 Digital Deluxe pack for you - £10.  
The Digital Deluxe versions will get you deeper into the story with making off articles, behind the scenes page break downs, anatomy of pages and character designs - for you to enjoy across your devices
Get the Paperback + Digital Deluxe Editions of both issue 1 and 2.   The Digital Deluxe Editions are so full of extra exclusive content that I put in for just for you - £19
Enjoy Digitopia 1.0 and 2.0 in both paperback and digital formats

Meticulously designed Digital Wallpapers for your phone, tablet and desktop and a pack of specially designed pack of 3 Art Cards, includes previous tier rewards - £24
Digitopia Wallpapers specially designed for your mobile, tablet and desktop + pack of 3 designer Digitopia postcard art set
 Audio Commentaries that get you deeper into the story + the scripts for issue 1 and 2!  Audio Commentary pack - £34
Exclusive audio commentaries of issue 1 + 2 to perfectly complement your books
Get the ultimate pack Video Commentary that get you deeper into the story + the scripts for issue 1 and 2!  Video Commentary pack - only £39.
Get all the rewards print + digital, plus a signed copy of both books + 2 extra digital comics
On top of everything else when you back at the Video Commentary level you'll also get  two extra free digital comics added courtesy of my friends at Comix Tribe (thanks Tyler for organising this for us) and signed copies of both issue 1 and 2.  
Includes previous rewards - you'll have everything.  
Meet the team
We have an All Star team of comic book creators - collectively them this team has worked on some of the best indie comic books of the past couple of years

Farhan Qureshi the writer, who has been writing for many years, feature film, animation and now comic books.  About the script Farhan says that 'the script for Digitopia 2.0 is unequivocally the best writing I've ever done, then I gave it to Hass, who made the script twice as good'.  
Speaking of Hassan Ostmane-Elhaou, Hassan edited Digitopia 1.0 and Digitopia 2.0 - he also edits PanelxPanel.  
Together with our amazingly talented art team, Tom Hoskisson is on pencils and inks and  Simon Robins, Art Director, Colourist and Letterer - the layout, inks and colours produced elevates the story to a whole new level.  
 This isn't the first book we've made - this team will deliver!
With the help of nearly 200 backers, we successfully launched Issue 1 of Digitopia the comic book series back in 2018 and 2019.  Following on from the Kickstarter, we launched the book on Amazon where it became an Amazon best seller - hitting the number 1 spot on Amazon in the comic's section.  
Digitopia 1.0: Displaced Dreams hit number 1 spot in the 'Fantasy Graphic Novels' category on Amazon
... and we also hit number 2 in the 'Action & Adventure Graphic Novels' category - coming second to only 'Batman vol1: I am Gotham', that's a pretty good result for our first book :)
Digitopia was ranked number 1 hot new release when it came out
Reviews from Amazon
You can see the project is coming along together really well.  We aim to make this comic book something very special indeed.  We believe touches issues and beats in a fresh original way - we hope you'll be able to get involved in this really exciting project. 
Thanks for your support!
Farhan, Simon, Tom and Hassan.
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
So the world is going through a global epidemic of COVID-19. Thankfully all our team are fine, we hope you are too. You can see the art is almost complete, Simon coloured and lettered issue 1 without any problem, we don't see any issue around issue 2. 

I have checked with our printer, Comics Printing UK and they are still running at normal operations. Postal services are still running as normal. 

I will keep backers up to date in case there are any changes.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter
