campaign.story:
Once upon a time, there was an alchemist who created magic: the alchemist of Aurillia. However, a witch came and stole that magic. Though magic spread to the whole world, their rivalry has never ceased!
Nuriye is a wizard in training in an alternate world version of the Ottoman Empire. She impulsively summons her own familiar, dreaming of powerful magic and prestige, only to be saddled with a weak lantern sprite named Shale. With a monster stalking the palace, these two are going to have to learn to get along if they want to survive the night!
 The Alchemist of Aurillia  is both a standalone story and the opener for a full length series. If you're a fan of Magi: The Labyrinth of Magic, Fairy Tail, or other fantasy-adventure stories, you'll love The Alchemist of Aurillia!
32 pages of shounen-inspired manga action in slick black and white, the introduction of Nuriye, Shale, and their first adventure together!
Full American comic standard size pages on sturdy 80lb paper for an enhanced reading experience
The complete story of Nuriye and Shale released to the public for the first time! And the chance to help their story continue...
Hello! I'm Melissa J Massey, creator of fine fantasy comics like Vatican Assassins, the tale of the Vatican's secret demon hunters, and Black Ball, a 1920s magical murder mystery, and now The Alchemist of Aurillia, my return to action fantasy and my usual penchant for drawing epic architecture. 
 I've been published in anthologies from Wannabe Press, Arcane Inkdustries, and Kara Love. 
 I'm coming to Kickstarter to do a print run of 100 copies of the standard cover and an additional, limited numbered run of the variant cover (only 50 copies! EVER!).  
The campaign will help me to gauge interest in The Alchemist of Aurillia for further development into an ongoing series. So if you want to see more of Nuriye, Shale, Betil, Master Ekbar, and a fantasy Ottoman Empire created by me, then you're going to want to get in on this campaign!
The great news is that all the art for the book is already done! In fact, the book is almost finished being edited and laid out--all I have to do is submit the order to the printer. 
The funds raised will cover the printing and shipping costs to support the book, with some additional funds to help with taxes and fees that may come up. Any additional funds will be used to print additional standard copies and add extras to the book. 
For more comics from me, you can check out my ongoing webcomic Black Ball with over 80 pages available to read for free! It updates every Thursday.
Campaign Ends: March 1st
Delivery of Kickstarter Funds: 2 weeks
Estimated Printing and Shipping time: 3 weeks
Packing all rewards and shipping: 4 weeks
Comissions:  16 weeks
I can't thank you enough for taking the time to learn about The Alchemist of Aurillia and Nuriye's world! If wizards fighting monsters in the Ottoman Empire is your thing, then this is the comic for you!
Make The Alchemist of Aurillia part of your library! Back this project today!
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
This is my first time running a campaign, but I've backed many campaigns across Kickstarter, so I know what I expect as a backer when I'm giving my hard earned money to creators. My number 1 goal is to deliver on your expectations, so I have minimized as many risks as possible to ensure a smooth fulfillment process.

Art on the book is 100% done and the book is sitting in completed layout on my computer at this very instance. That means that as soon as I have received completed surveys, all digital rewards will be delivered.

I have selected to work with the printer Mixam, which I have used in the past to print up issues of Black Ball, which came out beautifully. They also came out fast--I had my books in under two weeks. Since Mixam utilizes local printers, there will be no dealing with customs or port strikes. I will only have to wait to receive the Kickstarter funds to place the order.

I have made every effort to plan and prepare for this campaign. Part of this was surrounding myself with some of the most knowledgeable Kickstarter creators and to learn from the best. I have studied the ComixLaunch Kickstarter course for creating a successful Kickstarter campaign. 

If you have any concerns or questions, please feel free to message me. It is my goal to make your experience with me as rewarding and delightful as possible.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

updates.update_content:
Hello my beautiful backers! It's May 14th, and you know what that means!
No, not Eurovision (though it should have been).
It's Secret Launch Day! That means that for today only, you can get your hands on these limited time tiers, only for previous backers like you!

Hello my beautiful wonderful backers! Did you know you're the coolest kids in town?
First of all, I hope you are doing well and staying safe in these strange and difficult times. Remember to keep washing your hands and keep having good snacks to keep up morale.
Second, I want to know...what do YOU want. 
The relaunch campaign for The Alchemist of Aurillia is coming up on May 1, and this time, we're going to be successful. And I want to do it together with you.

campaign.story:
Milestone Bonuses Unlocked!
Milestone Bonuses
Diary of Night Process Editions
Arthur Bookmark
Anne Bookmark
Catherine Bookmark
A centuries-old vampire who protects her people and humanity from the worst of each other is stalked by her past.
Feared, hated, and hunted, vampires exist, but not those of myth and legend. Fundamentally, they are just like us. They are good, bad, happy, and sad, but mostly, they are just frightened...of the light, being found out, and, above all, dying again.
Catherine Morrison has spent nearly 900 years walking the line between humans and vampires...protecting her people from the worst of humanity and humanity from the worst of her people. Her vast wealth established the Phoenix Foundation, a non-Profit corporation whose sole purpose is to help her kind and give them a place to belong...a safe place...a community. Yet, she chooses to remain an outsider.
She is loved, feared, and sometimes even hated, but she’s never been hunted...until now.
Catherine will have to face the demon from her past and relive the horrifying events of her rebirth as a vampire to survive the evil that hunts her today. In doing so, she will realize that she is not as alone as she likes to pretend as her makeshift family strives to protect her.
Prototype Diary Entry
What I am doing with this campaign is creating 100 "Diary Editions" of the Diary of Night Volume 1 softcover. Each "Diary Edition" will include a handwritten, 100-word diary entry inside. Each one of these is unique. There will also be a collected edition of all 100 entries as a PDF for all backers. 95 of the entries have been written. The remaining 5 will be written by backers and I during the campaign.
Campaign Exclusives include digital rewards, signed bookplates, and even participation in the creation of new content for this collection!
Once funded, I will begin handwriting each diary entry in a Diary of Night Volume 1 softcover. Here is a list of the entries...
Will Allred is a writer, professor, and technologist. He created and wrote Diary of Night for BloodFire Studios, contributed to the Eisner-nominated Comics through Time and multiple other academic books on comics, and is writing a second novel.
Gene Gonzales is an illustrator living in Florida. Gene works in both digital and traditional mediums. He has created artwork for business training, graphic facilitation, primary, secondary and higher education text books, comic books, movies, and licensing.
Rus Wooton is a veteran letterer who has worked for Image Comics, Marvel Comics, Radical Comics, Archaia, and Dark Horse Comics. In addition, he is a freelance illustrator, graphic designer, and cartoonist.
Not convinced yet?
Download the Complete First Issue!
 Click the link above or the image below to get your FREE digital copy of Issue #1!
Check out all of these great rewards you can get in this campaign, including the limited HANDWRITTEN diary entry edition!
 As we hit these milestones during the campaign, some really cool extra rewards will be unlocked to all backers! 
Milestone Bonuses



I'm coming to Kickstarter again to expose more comics fans to Diary of Night and to help raise funds for the creation of more comics.
I want you to love this project. If you receive your rewards and are not happy with them, simply return your rewards within 30 days for a full refund.
Thank you so much for letting me share this project with you!
I really do appreciate your interest in this special edition of Diary of Night Volume 1. With your help, we can make this project a reality, so if this looks interesting, then please back and share with anyone you think might enjoy it.
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
The risks to this project are minimal.

As a member of the Kickstarter community, I respect your choice to back this project with your hard-earned money and have made every effort to minimize the risks associated with this campaign to backers.

The greatest risk to you as a backer is normally that the project never gets finished. In this case, that simply cannot happen as the project is already finished.

The books are already printed, and all but the diary entries with backer participation are written.

The campaign, however, will not truly be complete until every backer receives his or her rewards.

If you haven any questions or concerns about this project, please don't hesitate to contact me.

Again, I thank you for your time and your support.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

updates.update_content: 48 HOURS left for the Crossover Division #1 campaign!

Thank you so much for supporting me in my previous projects.
My latest project, Crossover Division #1 has just entered its last week here on Kickstarter, and you can help us hit our next milestone bonus on our way to funding.
Crossover Division #1 has launched!
I'm launching a new project on November 11th, Crossover Division #1.

Thanks for supporting me and Diary of Night!
Quick fulfillment update.
As of tomorrow, all rewards will have been sent out!

Thank you for supporting me and Diary of Night!
Just a quick update to let you know that 2/3 of the physical rewards have been sent out as of today.
Also, everyone should now have the digital rewards. I hope you enjoyed the bonus stories.
I plan to ship the remaining rewards out this week.

Thank you for supporting me and Diary of Night!
I'll be sending surveys out in a few minutes. The PDF of all 100 diary entries is nearly done, so I hope start fulfillment on Tuesday (March 17th).
I won't be sending out surveys for the Diary of Night Volume 1 Diary Edition reward level, though. I want to try something a little different with the handwritten diary entries. Instead of me just starting with the first entry and assigning that to the first backer at that level and so on, I thought it might be more fun to let each backer choose the entry that they like the most. So, to do that, you kind of have to have the entries.

Thank you for supporting me and Diary of Night!
The final 5 diary entries have been written, so I've turned everything over to designer extraordinaire Brant Fowler to create a beautiful digital collection. Not only is Brant awesome, he's fast. So, expect surveys to go out within a few days, and fulfillment to begin in earnest next week.
Working with you to create this project has been a wonderful experience, and I hope you enjoy the results.

All right, I've closed voting, so here are the results for the final 5 diary entries...
Roanoke Colony 15 points
Boudica 11 points
Ching Shih (1775-1844) 10 points

campaign.story:
Celestial Falcon is a coming of age story about an unlikely hero who, along with his friends, is tasked to save the world from a dark and ancient evil that threatens to consume and destroy all life on Earth.
 THANK YOU for getting us funded a week early! Now, let's make some stretch goals!
 Lisa will be coloring the selfie postcard LIVE on The Chris & Brant Show this week! Watch the updates for when and where!
First Stretch Goal - All Physical Backers get this "selfie" postcard when we reach $1,800!
There is an unseen war raging just beneath the surface about to bubble over. A war that has lasted for centuries and is about to come to a head. New warriors are needed to fight and defend the world in this war, and those heroes come from places you'd least expect.
Chris always felt like something was missing, that there was more to his life. Something greater he was meant to do. When a mysterious stranger comes into his and his friends' lives, he learns he was right and everything changes. 
This is the Epic Story of Celestial Falcon.
The book is COMPLETELY DONE!
 Who Is Celestial Falcon For? 
Fans of Superhero Comics like Spider-Man, Superman,  Teen Titans and Invincible.
If you like coming of age stories and relatable characters.
Collectors who like high quality independent comics from up-and-coming creators passionate about what they do.
If you like stories that give you action, drama, comedy and expanded universes with a supernatural twist, then you'll love Celestial Falcon!
 What You Will Get When You Back Celestial Falcon: 
 Celestial Falcon #1 Deluxe Edition is a 32-page standard American size single issue comic book printed on high quality paper.
This is an extra-sized issue with 28 interior pages containing a 4-page backup story expanding on each of the six main characters that isn't available in the standard edition.
There are five different covers for the Deluxe Edition, a signed bookplate and various other rewards across the different tiers. Our rewards are stacked!
All backers will receive extra bonus content throughout the campaign, including stickers, prints, digital comics and more!
*NOTE: Add $15 to ANY physical pledge and add a variant cover of your choice to your pledge!
 COLLECTORS! CHECK OUT THE CELESTIAL CRATE! 
At one of the higher reward levels, you will find The Celestial Crate, which is chock-full of everything you find in this campaign, including variant covers, stickers, posters, additional comics and more!
 The Celestial Crate is a limited edition collector's box, get them while they last!
We have unlocked a couple milestone bonuses throughout the campaign so far. Check them out.
For hitting 50% funding on day one, ALL backers will be getting this digital comic:
And for reaching 50 backers, ALL backers will also get this digital comic bundle:
When we hit 75% funding, we'll unlock another bonus reward!
Chris DiBuduo (Creator, Co-Writer)
Chris is a YouTuber and lifelong comic book and Superman fan. He has been writing stories for half his life, and now gets to live out his dream seeing his creations in print. Celestial Falcon is his first comic book.
Brant Fowler (Co-Writer, Letterer)
Brant is the Co-Publisher of Last Ember Press and writer of The Last Ember series. He has also been lettering comics for the better part of two decades, with work published through Image Comics, Action Lab Entertainment, Arcana, Moonstone, AC Comics and more. Celestial Falcon is his first foray into full-on co-writing a project.
Lucas Santos (Penciler, Cover Artist)
Lucas is a 2D and 3D artist developing artwork for comic books, and concept art for the entertainment industry. He is the series artist for Celestial Falcon and creator of the fan comic Spider-Cop. https://www.artstation.com/lulisluc
Lisa Moore (Inker, Colorist)
Lisa is a comic book enthusiast, colorist and illustrator, working in and around the industry since 2007! She has worked as a colorist on books like Garfield, Peanuts, Bravest Warriors and more for BOOM! Studios, Damsels and Grimm for Dynamite Entertainment and more.
She is also the writer of The Secrets of Willowmyst for Last Ember Press, where she also serves as Co-Publisher. She also inks and creates clip art among other things.
Variant Covers by Lisa Moore, Riccardo Faccini and Lucas Santos.
Why Celestial Falcon became the story I had to share with the world:
Chris: Growing up, I loved writing. I loved telling stories to people who would listen. Celestial Falcon is a story that was created around a time where the world needed a bit of hope. HOPE: that was what I wanted this character to represent above all else. Of course there’s your “truth and justice” but 'hope' had to be the number 1 thing. In the times we live in right now the world needs a little bit more light, a little bit more positivity and that is what I wish to bring the world through my stories, our writing, through Celestial Falcon.
What attracted me to the story of Celestial Falcon:
Brant: Early on in my friendship with Chris, he shared with me the story behind Celestial Falcon. He and his friends had created a YouTube series called Epic Story years ago that was one version of the story, which I watched in its entirety. I could see the passion Chris had for these characters and this world. When I read the actual stories the videos were derived from I began to understand the rich and detailed world Chris had crafted.
When Chris asked me to come on as co-writer on the book, I was a little hesitant because I didn't want to step on his toes, but at the same time I felt I had something to add to this world. Together, we have tweaked and modernized the story and taken it to a whole new level, intertwining our writing styles and voices to make something truly unique. And while, yes, it's a superhero book, there's a lot more to it than you see on the surface, and I'm very excited to reveal some of those secrets, twists and turns as the series moves forward!
Check out our interview on ComicFrontline.com with Nicole D'Andria by clicking here or clicking the image below!
 "Very professionally done. Well done, guys." 
     ~ JLS Comics
"I'm really excited for the ride and where it's going to go!"
     ~ Comic Uno
Kickstarter has proven to be a valuable resource for us in the past, both in spreading awareness of and building an audience for our comics, and in helping us shoulder the production costs associated with making independent comics. We've come to love and respect the Kickstarter community, much like returning to a comic convention year after year.
With your support, we can take this Deluxe Edition to print and use any additional funds to pour into the next issue so we can keep bringing you more Celestial Falcon!
This team has put their own money into this project already, producing the standard edition from their own pockets, not to mention all the time invested. The main story is COMPLETELY DONE and the backup story is penciled and inked! It will be done during the campaign.
This is all the cool stuff you can get for supporting Celestial Falcon!
Add $15 to any physical level pledge for an extra variant cover of your choice! Just leave us a comment or shoot us a message letting us know and which variant you want!
Cover A (main cover) by Lucas Santos and Lisa Moore
Cover B (Sand Angels) virgin variant by Lisa Moore
Cover C (Vintage Poster Variant) by Lisa Moore after Lucas Santos
Cover D (Baseball variant) by Riccardo Faccini and Lisa Moore
Cover E (Girl Power Vintage Poster Variant) by Lisa Moore after Lucas Santos

We Care About Our Products
And we know you do too! That's why we make sure they are as safe as possible, bagged and boarded, and inserted inside Gemini Comic Supply Comic Flash Mailers to protect your investment!
Additional smaller rewards, if applicable, will be secured in bubble envelopes and placed inside the mailers with the comics.
The Celestial Crate will be bubble wrapped and then inserted into another shipping box so that it is not damaged either.
Thank you so much for checking out the campaign. If you like what you see, we'd be thrilled to have you join the campaign!
Now that you've made it this far, you're most likely already trying to decide which reward you want to grab. So go ahead and scroll back up the page and check them out again! We can't wait to hear what you think of the book once you've read it!
On behalf of the entire creative team and everyone at Last Ember Press and Shooting Star Universe, thank you so much for your support!
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
Kickstarter has been a huge part of the success of Last Ember Press since the first campaign we ran in 2017. Since then, we've found great success on the Kickstarter platform and earned the trust of our backers, something we take very seriously.

While there are always unforeseeable complications that arise with a campaign, and ones we learn from each and every time out, we always strive to deliver the best experience we possibly can for our backers. We have a track record of delivering on our past campaigns and this one is no different.

We are working with a US-based high quality printer so delays are minimized.

The book is completely done. We are ready to go to print as soon as we receive funds and will keep backers updated on any unexpected delays or issues.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

updates.update_userinfo: Reforged is Out + A New Launch!
updates.update_content:
Hey backers!
Hope all is well and you're navigating the current landscape we find ourselves in in 2020! I know we're all just doing our best. Thankfully, we have comics to distract us!
On that note, I'm happy to report that those that had backed both this campaign and The Last Ember #1: Reforged, your packages have now shipped!

We are thrilled to share this news that the issue 2 relaunch got tagged with Project We Love!
How cool is that?!
To celebrate, we gave a free digital comic to backers! You can check out the update here:
PROJECT WE LOVE
We are currently 160% funded and we'll be hitting the 72 hour mark in about 30 minutes! So there's no time like the present to go check it out!

Hey everyone!
Last week, we relaunched issue 2 of Celestial Falcon and we were FUNDED in 5 HOURS!
Currently, we're almost at 150% funding with a few days to go. It ENDS THIS FRIDAY, OCTOBER 16th!
This morning, we announced our first Stretch Goal:

Hey everyone!
I hope you've enjoyed issue 1 now that you've had a chance to read it. We'd love to hear your feedback if you have!
As for issue 2, our campaign fell just shy of our goal a couple of weeks ago, but we are RELAUNCHING VERY SOON! In fact, our page got approved last night, and we have the PRELAUNCH page up now:

Hey everyone!
We are entering the FINAL 36 HOURS of the issue 2 campaign!
Many of you have come over and backed issue 2 already, and we are so, so, SO grateful for that. Thank you!
If you haven't backed issue 2 yet, please consider doing so. These are the FINAL HOURS of the campaign, so there's not much time left!

Hey everyone!
A couple of updates.
First, there are ONLY 5 DAYS LEFT to back Issue 2, so PLEASE head over there and back it if you haven't already!
We just announced yesterday that ALL physical level backers will receive this gorgeous print by Laura Rimaszombati in addition to other rewards!

Hey all!
We just added a New Reward Tier on the Issue 2 campaign where you can get JUST the FOIL Battle Variant cover plus extras for only $23 with FREE US SHIPPING!

Hey everyone!
First, you should have received or will be receiving soon your packages unless you opted to wait for The Last Ember #1: Reforged.
We've already seen pictures of some receiving them:

We have officially launched issue 2! And we have an Early Bird special going on!
Check it out here:
CELESTIALFALCON.COM/KS2

Hey everyone!
PACKAGES SHIPPING
Most of you should have gotten an email notification with a tracking number that your packages are on the way!

project_data.project_name: Celestial Falcon #1: Supernatural Warfare in Superhero Style

campaign.story:
Celestial Falcon is a coming of age story about an unlikely hero who, along with his friends, is tasked to save the world from a dark and ancient evil that threatens to consume and destroy all life on Earth. 
Chris always felt like something was missing, that there was more to his life. Something greater he was meant to do. When a mysterious stranger comes into his and his friends' lives, he learns he was right as everything changes. This is the Epic Story of Celestial Falcon.
The Main Story is COMPLETELY DONE! The Backup Story is Penciled & Inked!
As we reach certain funding goals, throughout the campaign we will be unlocking these bonuses that will be added to your pledges!
The first 3 Milestone Bonuses have been unlocked! Can we get the rest unlocked too?!



NEW REWARD TIERS!
Check out these awesome new reward tiers we just added featuring a BRAND NEW VARIANT COVER!
In each of these new tiers, you get the new Vintage Sami Variant (Cover E)!

 Who Is Celestial Falcon For? 
Fans of Superhero Comics like Spider-Man, Superman,  Teen Titans and Invincible.
If you like coming of age stories and relatable characters.
Collectors who like high quality independent comics from up-and-coming creators passionate about what they do.
If you like stories that give you action, drama, comedy and expanded universes, then you'll love Celestial Falcon!
 What You Will Get When You Back Celestial Falcon: 
 Celestial Falcon #1 Deluxe Edition is a 32-page standard American size single issue comic book printed on high quality paper. 
All physical product backers get the Main Cover (A) plus an 8-page annotated companion comic!
This is an extra-sized issue with 28 interior pages containing a 4-page backup story expanding on each of the six main characters that isn't available in the standard edition.
All backers will receive extra bonus content throughout the campaign, including stickers, prints, digital comics and more!
 COLLECTORS! CHECK OUT THE CELESTIAL CRATE! 
At higher reward levels, you will find The Celestial Crate, which is chock-full of everything you find in this campaign, including variant covers, stickers, buttons, posters, prints and more! 
At the highest level, you can even appear as a character in the next issue!

Chris DiBuduo (Creator, Co-Writer)
Chris is a YouTuber and lifelong comic book and Superman fan. He has been writing stories for half his life, and now gets to live out his dream seeing his creations in print. Celestial Falcon is his first comic book.
Brant Fowler (Co-Writer, Letterer)
Brant is the Co-Publisher of Last Ember Press and writer of The Last Ember series. He has also been lettering comics for the better part of two decades, with work published through Image Comics, Action Lab Entertainment, Arcana, Moonstone, AC Comics and more. Celestial Falcon is his first foray into full-on co-writing a project.
Lucas Santos (Penciler, Cover Artist)
Lucas is a 2D and 3D artist developing artwork for comic books, and concept art for the entertainment industry. He is the series artist for Celestial Falcon and creator of the fan comic Spider-Cop. https://www.artstation.com/lulisluc
Lisa Moore (Inker, Colorist)
Lisa is a comic book enthusiast, colorist and illustrator, working in and around the industry since 2007! She has worked as a colorist on books like Garfield, Peanuts, Bravest Warriors and more for BOOM! Studios, Damsels and Grimm for Dynamite Entertainment and more.
She is also the writer of The Secrets of Willowmyst for Last Ember Press, where she also serves as Co-Publisher. She also inks and creates clip art among other things.
Variant Covers by Lisa Moore, Riccardo Faccini and Lucas Santos.
Check out our interview on ComicFrontline.com with Nicole D'Andria by clicking here or clicking the image below!
Chris Writes...
Why Celestial Falcon became the story I had to share with the world:
Growing up, I loved writing. I loved telling stories to people who would listen. Celestial Falcon is a story I started to write back when I was 15 years old. It was a personal story I honestly started to write about myself. My original pitch was “it’s my life with a super hero twist”. This was a story I wrote mostly for my close friends and family to read and enjoy, which they did. As I continued to write Celestial Falcon, I realized how passionate I was about this story above all my other stories. Books filled with over 20 stories, outlines of futures stories, time lines, characters… a whole universe was created almost overnight from Celestial Falcon. Fast forward nearly 15 years later I decided to team up with my closest friend Brant Fowler to bring the world this story in comic form.
Celestial Falcon was created around the time where the world needed a bit of hope. HOPE: that was what I wanted this character to represent above all else. Of course there’s your “truth and justice” but hope had to be the number 1 thing. In the times we live in right now the world needs a little bit more light, a little bit more hope and THAT is what I hope to bring the world through my writing, through Celestial Falcon.
Brant Writes...
What attracted me to the story of Celestial Falcon:
Early on in my friendship with Chris, he shared with me the story behind Celestial Falcon. He and his friends had created a YouTube series called Epic Story years ago that was one version of the story, which I watched in its entirety. I could see the passion Chris had for these characters and this world. When I read the actual stories the videos were derived from I began to understand the rich and detailed world Chris had crafted.
When Chris asked me to come on as co-writer on the book, I was a little hesitant because I didn't want to step on his toes, but at the same time I felt I had something to add to this world. Together, we have tweaked and modernized the story and taken it to a whole new level, intertwining our writing styles and voices to make something truly unique. And while, yes, it's a superhero book, there's a lot more to it than you see on the surface, and I'm very excited to reveal some of those secrets, twists and turns as the series moves forward!
This team has put their own money into this project already, producing the standard edition from their own pockets, not to mention all the time invested. The main story is COMPLETELY DONE and the backup story is penciled and inked! It will be done during the campaign.
With your support, we can take this Deluxe Edition to print and use any additional funds to pour into the next issue so we can keep bringing you more Celestial Falcon!
Last Ember Press has had great help from the Kickstarter community in launching and growing our brand, and we've had great success doing so! Now we are expanding with the Shooting Star Universe brand and looking to deliver yet another awesome campaign with Celestial Falcon #1 Deluxe Edition!
Check out this preview to see what's in store in the book, and be sure to scroll down to get a sneak peek at the new back-up story!
The Backup Story
In this Deluxe Edition of Celestial Falcon #1, we included a brand new 4-page story that features each of our six main characters, giving a little peek into each of their lives.  We reached out to some other artists we work with or will potentially be working with to put these four pages together: Riccardo Faccini (page 1), Rowel Roque (pages 2-3) and Lucas Santos (page 4):

This is all the cool stuff you can get for supporting Celestial Falcon!
COVER GALLERY
Check out these amazing covers, including the brand new main cover done especially for this Deluxe Edition!
Main Cover (A) by Series Artist Lucas Santos!
Cover B, Sand Angels Virgin Variant by Lisa Moore!
Cover C, Vintage Movie Poster Variant Featuring Chris. By Lisa Moore After Lucas Santos!
Cover D, Baseball Variant by Riccardo Faccini!
Cover E, Vintage Movie Poster Variant Featuring Sami. By Lisa Moore After Lucas Santos!
Companion Book Cover, by Lucas Santos!
The Standard Edition Limited Cover (there aren't many left!) by Lucas Santos!
We Care About Our Products
And we know you do too! That's why we make sure they are as safe as possible, bagged and boarded, and inserted inside Gemini Comic Supply Comic Flash Mailers to protect your investment!
Additional rewards, like the keychains and enamel pins, will be secured in bubble envelopes and placed inside the mailers with the comics.
The Celestial Crate will be bubble wrapped and then inserted into another shipping box so that it is not damaged either.
Thank you so much for checking out the campaign. If you like what you see, we'd be thrilled to have you join the campaign!
This is my first Kickstarter personally, and my first comic, so I'm especially excited to share it with you! - Chris
Now that you've made it this far, you're most likely already trying to decide which reward you want to grab. So go ahead and scroll back up the page and check them out again! We can't wait to hear what you think of the book once you've read it!
On behalf of the entire creative team and everyone at Last Ember Press and Shooting Star Universe, thank you so much for your support!

Kickstarter has been a huge part of the success of Last Ember Press since the first campaign we ran in 2017. Since then, we've found great success on the Kickstarter platform and earned the trust of our backers, something we take very seriously.

While there are always unforeseeable complications that arise with a campaign, and ones we learn from each and every time out, we always strive to deliver the best experience we possibly can for our backers. We have a track record of delivering on our past campaigns and this one is no different. 

We are working with a US-based high quality printer so delays are minimalized.

updates.update_userinfo: Funded and On to Stretch Goals!
updates.update_content:
Hey all!
Last week, we relaunched issue 2 and it FUNDED IN 5 HOURS! Unbelievable, right?!
Now, we are moving into Stretch Goals, and this morning we revealed our first one!

updates.update_userinfo: Get Notified for the Issue 2 Relaunch!
updates.update_content:
Hey everyone!
Sadly, we did not quite reach our funding goal on the print edition of issue 2. But that's not stopping us!
We are relaunching with a VERY SHORT DIGITAL ONLY campaign VERY SOON!
Go to this link and click the green button to get notified when we launch:
CelestialFalcon.com/take2

There are only 5 DAYS LEFT to back Celestial Falcon #1-2!
Yesterday, we announced that, in addition to all the other rewards, ALL physical backers will get this stunning print by Laura Rimaszombati!

Check it out here:
GET ISSUE 2 TODAY!
We have an Early Bird special, an updated Celestial Crate, and much more!

Hey everyone!
The Prelaunch Page for Celestial Falcon #2 is now LIVE!

Hey everyone!
Thought you'd like to know that the project has been relaunched and slightly restructured. Now, our rewards stack, so each tier adds the previous variants and other rewards!
You can check it out here:

Chris and I announced the relaunch earlier this week. 
Go here and click Notify Me to get an update when the project goes live:
https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/brantfowler/celestial-falcon-1-supernatural-warfare-in-superhero-style
We hope all of you that came out in support of it last time will come back and support it this time.

Hello, everyone!
Well, we didn't make it, and I'm a little sad about it with it being my first Kickstarter, but it's okay. We had a couple of contingency plans in place, so we'll be okay. In fact, we'll be relaunching soon and we'll update here when we do! 
We can't thank you enough for everyone that came out to support this launch! The past couple of days, we had a huge outpouring of support that warmed my heart and got me excited, and for that, I am personally beyond grateful! This book has been with me for over half my life, and it really means a lot to me that you all wanted to support and read it. THANK YOU!

Just over 3 HOURS to go, everyone! Currently at 77% as I type this. We can do this!!!
We just unlocked the third Milestone Bonus, a selfie postcard of the cast by Lucas Santos:

campaign.story:
To pre-order this product for November delivery and help make our second Kickstarter another success, please click Back This Project above.  
Why EZSTAX?
EZSTAX File Organizers take the best parts of file folders, letter trays, and filing cabinets to combine them into a simple solution that covers the needs of all three with a lower price and better functionality.
File Naturally - Have you ever sat at your desk (or even on the floor) spreading out piles of papers in an effort to organize that unending mess?
Sort your papers by spreading out on EZSTAX, and then stack them up to make a neatly organized filing system.  Spread back out again any time. 
Spread Out or Stack Up as Needed
A Single EZSTAX File Organizer
EZSTAX File Organizers are a series of interlocking trays designed to hold standard 8.5" x 11" papers. They have four alternating tabs on the front and a finger hole in the middle for easy access. 
Nesting Fins Stack to Form an Organized System - The five hollow fins nest on top of the EZSTAX below it allowing you to stack them while taking up little more room than the papers you put on them. 
Hollow FIns Allow EZSTAX to Connect With Each Other
Add to a Stack- If you have just a few papers to add, simply tilt EZSTAX upward to add a paper to any stack of files.
Adjust to Any Stack Size - Like an endless set of letter trays, you can stack them about as high as you like.  Add another tray to a stack any time or make multiple stacks for multiple reasons.  Try doing that with traditional desktop organizers! 
Functional - With a finger hole in the middle and four alternating label tabs (a set of blank labels included), it's easy to organize your papers and grab what you need any time.
Durable and Reusable - Re-label anytime you want to change your files.  The four alternating tabs make it simple to name your files.  We will include a set of 1/2" x 1 3/4" labels (Avery 8167 equivalent) making it easy to print labels or to hand write in multiple colors.  Additional labels are easy to find if you run out.
Portable - Take your files with you.  File outside on a gorgeous day.  Work in the kitchen then put them away.  Or file at your favorite coffee shop. 
Adaptable - Use them like a simple inbox/outbox system.  File by category, project, function, etc.  Collate presentations.  Store long term large stacks on shelves. 
Not Just For the Office -  Clean up that kitchen mess of bills, coupons, kids papers, and other "to do's".  Keep a stack wherever paper piles tend to form.  Organize mail right where it tends to go.
Great in the Office, Home, or Home Office
Patriotic and Sustainable -  Sure, it would be cheaper to manufacture elsewhere, but each EZSTAX File Organizer is Made in the USA from Recycled Materials! 
Economical - Most letter tray and desktop filing systems average $3 to $6 per "level" or more.  EZSTAX File Organizers will retail at about $1.50 per tray.  Go ahead and compare that to the cost of file folders and a filing cabinet as well. 
Versatile - Do you have multiple forms, brochures, or other materials that you need easy access to?  There's no better easy way to keep them handy than EZSTAX.
EZSTAX File Organizers
Whether you use them in the home, office, or home office, EZSTAX File Organizers are sure to make your life easier.  Please back our project now by pledging above and we'll make sure you get yours in November! 
Thanks in advance for your support!
 Please share our project using the buttons next to the "back us now" button and please follow us on social media!  Links below:
 EZSTAX.com
 www.facebook.com/ezstaxorganizers
 www.twitter.com/ezstaxorganizer
 www.pinterest.com/ezstax 
www.instagram.com/ezstaxorganizers
This project is promoted by Jellop, the ad tech power behind the best Kickstarters with 800+ successful Kickstarter projects with over $350MM raised between them.
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
Thank you Kickstarter and our tremendous Backers for making our first project a success!

You made our original EZSTAX Closet Organizers a reality and a hit by funding 1,000% of our goal two years ago. Since then, we've enjoyed tremendous success selling on EZSTAX.com, Amazon, Bed Bath and Beyond, and Walmart!

You asked for the office version, so we built it! We have listened to our customers along the way and have learned how many of you enjoyed filing using our EZSTAX organizers, even the ones designed more with clothes in mind.

We've listened to your requests, ideas, and concerns and feel we have created the perfect product for filing papers. We are so very excited to get it into our customers' hands! 

It's been a heck of a ride and we've learned a lot along the way. While we were a couple months late shipping on our first project, we did ship to every one of our backers and are very proud of our first success. 

We don't feel there is much risk to your pledge. We WILL get this done. Our systems are already in place for manufacturing, packaging, and shipping. Just add your support and we're good to go. 

Thanks to you, we are a successful business now with the ability and knowledge to complete this project and put the EZSTAX File Organizers in your hands on time.

One of the things we have learned is that to sell a product to the big box retailers takes a lot of profit and margins. We have done the best we can to keep the pricing down for our Kickstarter backers. We anticipate the KIckstarter pricing to be about a 10 to 30% discount to future retail pricing. 

So....get them while they are hot and help us make this another success!
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

updates.update_content:
We just approved the production samples and they look awesome!  Production will start this week and end by next.  Once production has been completed, we will ship the product to fulfillment and then it will begin to be spread out through the country.  We use Amazon to handle our shipping so don't be surprised to see your product show up in a box with the familiar Amazon logo on it!
It's likely that some of you will get your product in early November and the rest by the middle of November but given that this is November, fulfillment is starting to get overloaded by retailers getting ready for the holiday season.  Please be patient.  We will make sure everyone gets their product as soon as possible but some of you may not get it until closer to the end of November.

updates.update_userinfo: One week in - Almost 6x our goal!

Thanks again to everyone!  
We're already putting the wheels in motion and hope to deliver as early as possible.  Please share this project with your friends and family.    It's a reality product you can be proud to share your part in!
Thanks again!

campaign.story:
Hi, I'm Dave Kellett, and I'm making a hardcover collection of comics called ANATOMY OF AUTHORS! It's a series of goofy literature comics poking fun at all your favorite authors, and now it's time to collect them into a delightful hardcover! 
"Anatomy of Authors" is a hilarious take on High School biology charts...but instead of pointing out where the "thorax" is, we're going to learn truly important things like:
Why does every character name in a Dickens book sound like a weird Pokémon?
Did Shakespeare coin new words by hanging out at the mall?
How did Mark Twain master 1,000 jobs...but never master combing his dang hair? 
These comics are 100% free to read on the site, so check 'em out! Or check out the samples below!
SAMPLE COMICS FROM THE BOOK: 
104-PAGE HARDCOVER BOOK!
PRINTED IN FULL COLOR!
DIMENSIONS: 10 3/4” x 8 1/4” (273mm x 209mm)!
WRAPPED IN A FANCY-SHMANCY CLOTH SPINE!
YOU GUYS...IT'S GONNA LOOK SO NEAT!
* Cover design subject to small changes 
 Want to back the book? Here's a quick guide to rewards you'll get! (And to help, each level calls out the added reward from the previous level!) 
 In addition to the book, higher reward tiers will also be receiving awesome items such as...
Planning on backing at the THE CRITIC'S CHOICE or THE COMPLETIST levels, and would like a piece of SHELDON original comic art? You're welcome to claim *any* SHELDON original in the archives: Just look for comics that don't say "PURCHASED" underneath them in red text on the site. If you would like an ANATOMY OF AUTHORS strip, here is a handy-dandy spreadsheet!   
 We are making the book! Hooray! And now we're shooting to add these stretch goals to your book - at no extra cost to you!! 
Remember Anatomy of Animals? The book turned out great and we intend to duplicate it's look and feel, but with a more literary feel.  
 We're planning to ship your book out in December using USPS. And, because we'll be shipping direct from the studio, each package will be getting a little smooch on its way out the door. EXTRA SMOOCHES FOR YOU, BASICALLY.
A NOTE FOR INTERNATIONAL FRIENDS: We're charging *exactly what it costs us* to ship from the USA. So if you live in London or Sydney or Berlin, the shipping, alas, is what it is. But to help, we made a handy-dandy shipping chart to help your decision, BELOW. Sometimes, going up or down one tier can save you a bit, so it's worth comparing. 
 Dave Kellett is the cartoonist behind the webcomics SHELDON and DRIVE, the co-Director on the comics documentary, STRIPPED, and one of the voices behind the podcast COMICLAB. He's won the Silver Reuben Award for his comics, and twice been nominated for "Best Humor" for the Eisner Award. 
He is currently 5'8" tall.  
LINKS: Sheldon | Drive | Stripped | ComicLab | Twitter | Instagram 
 Directed by: Fred Schroeder
Edited by: Ben Waters
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
This is my 9th Kickstarter, and my 18th book, so I'm feeling confident about this project. But I do know that unexpected hiccups can pop up along the way. Should any problems or delays arise with the ANATOMY OF AUTHORS book, backers can expect to be kept well-informed with regular updates until the problem is fixed.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

Friends! MY FAVORITE PROJECT THAT I HAVE EVER DONE is Kickstarting right now. It's my comedic sci-fi story DRIVE -- and this Kickstarter let's you get Act 3, or Acts 1, 2, 3!
It's also the last-last-last chance to get the full Sheldon book collection, as a full titles are almost sold out. So head over and check out the Kickstarter: https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/smallfish/drive-act-3-hardcover/

Friends! There are 48 hours left to get my Kickstarter two-pack at NewSheldonBook.com! 
Help these comics collections into the world, AND save $10 by getting them in this Kickstarter vs. later on! 
We've unlocked 4 stretch goals already, and soon your physical books could come with up to five free ebooks! I hope you'll JOIN US!

updates.update_userinfo: You now get 32 more pages of comics! Wooooooo!

ohboyohboyohboy! Thanks to amazing support, we just unlocked the first stretch goal in the NewSheldonBook.com Kickstarter! Which means you now get 32 extra pages of Sheldon Comics -- AT NO EXTRA COST! So now, instead of get 400 pages, you get 432 pages at one low price! So help bring these books into the world, and get yours today, at NewSheldonBook.com!

These are twice the size of previous Sheldon books -- it's over 400 pages of comics! That's a lotta joy packed in to two huge books, at a time when we could all use a laugh.
Help bring these books into the world by claiming your copy now at NewSheldonBook.com!

campaign.story:
Hello there, both new and old friends! My name is Alexandra and I'm the owner and illustrator behind Unicorn Paper, a small stationery and accessory brand that believes in the magic of small joys! I want to welcome  you to my 4th Kickstarter Campaign! I'm really happy and excited that you've dropped by ~ ♥! 
One of my most favorite things is to imagine and create little collections full of wonder. This Kickstarter campaign is a celebration for the love between a human and their best friend familiars.
The Witch’s Familiar Pet Adoption Service is open to all witches and wizards who are ready to start their magical journey! 
With 13 different species to choose from you can be sure to find the right partner or team to suit your ALL of your magical pursuits. 
Each pledge will come with a certificate of adoption. You’ll be able to name your familiars and make it official with your signature and date~!
Kickstarter is crowdfunding platform. It's also a wonderful community of creatives hoping to take things from ideation to creation!  Since Kickstarter is an "all-or-nothing" format it means that if a project doesn't get funded you will not be charged.
You can always pledge now risk-free and pay later! Increase, decrease or even cancel your pledge at any time during this Kickstarter. Pledging also helps to unlock designs and fun freebies during the campaign! You can pledge for all the items you want, regardless of their locked/unlocked status. ❤
You will only be charged when the Kickstarter campaign ends. If we don't reach our goal by the end of the campaign date you will not be charged. It's that simple! This campaign is set up to run for 27 days. The end date is listed at the top of the campaign along with the funding goal.   
Kickstarter backers are also getting a discount by participating here first. (PLUS receiving any fun goodies that may be unlocked along the way.) After the campaign, all enamel pins will be sold for a higher price in my shop’s website!
If you ever have any questions about how this works, or about this campaign in general you are always welcome to contact me! 
All the pins will come on a fancy holographic foil backer card! Here is a lil’ mockup to illustrate what that will look like ~ 🔮✨
The initial funding goal is to cover the production of the first design -- with every other design unlocking in order as stretch goals! 
Each pin ranges from 1.5"-1.75" Inches and may come with special details such as screen printing. They will all be in a gold finish and come with two pink rubber backings!   
 These additional stretch goals are thanks to the love and support of backer community! ♥ Additional designs may be added, so check back often!
 One thing I love about Kickstarter is all the fun extras! Every backer will automatically receive a FREE 'Certificate of Adoption' and a 'Mini Art Thank you Print'! 
Note: Extra 'Certificates of Adoption' are available as an add-on! 
Unlocked: 
⭐ FREE matte vinyl sticker for all backers! 
⭐ Any backer with 2 or more pins in their pledge will get the "Kiki's Hat" pin for FREE! 
⭐ Any backer with 4 or more pins in their pledge will get the "Kiki's Hat" pin AND the "Kiki the Witch" pin for FREE! 
Be sure to share this campaign with your friends and family so we can have more fun goodies to share! 
 Extra goodies are now available in this add-on section. This area is constantly updating so be sure to check back often! 
To add these items to your pledge, add the correct amount to your pledge total for each additional item you would like to receive!
For example, if you pledged for $22 for x2 pins + $4 for shipping costs and you wanted to add 2 art prints ($12) your new total would be: $22 + $4 + $12 = $38. 
Please be sure to read each add-on section carefully as the amounts and instructions will vary by item! 
Want to add an additional pin to your pledge? 
If you are an early bird backer and you would like to add additional pins to your pledge:
add $10 per pin to your current pledge total with shipping.  
If you are not an early bird backer and would like to add additional pins, please change to a higher reward tier!  (Manage your Pledge >> Change Your Pledge >> Select new reward tier)
To change your pledge amount, click the the "Manage Your Pledge" button (located at the top of the campaign page or by clicking your current reward tier). Then click the "Change your pledge" button. Add your add-on total to the current pledge amount and voilà!
This Kickstarter will run for 27 days and will end around early September. Below is an approximation of how the timelines should work.
  Early September 2019 - Project Ends
The Kickstarter reward survey will be sent out to backers when the campaign is over and fully funded. It takes 15-20 days after the end of a successful campaign for the funds to be transferred from Kickstarter. Once the funds are in hand -- the pins will immediately be put into production. 
**Please make sure address and pin selections are correct during your survey and reply back as soon as possible!** 
Mid September 2019 -  Production & Prep
Manufacturer will take up to 4-8 weeks on production time. Once the pins are finished it will take approximately 1 week for the pins to ship to me. Once I’ve received them they will be thoroughly inspected and then packaged cutely (see photos above!) for backers to enjoy. 
Early to Mid October 2019 -  Rewards Begin Shipping Out
Below is an approximate delivery schedule. These timelines may be sooner or later depending on your location and postal service provider.
US/Canada: 1-2 weeks delivery
Europe: 2-4 weeks delivery
Australia: 2-5 weeks delivery
Everyone Else: 3-5 weeks delivery
It is encouraged to triple check the address used when you make your pledge to help minimize risks of packages getting lost. 
All parcels within the United States will include a tracking number at no additional cost! 
For international backers:
International parcels are shipped using a Global Advantage Program. This postage method is untracked in order to keep costs low for our international backers. I have yet to have a parcel go missing, but if you feel more comfortable and would like to add tracking to your pledge that is totally possible!  
Please notify me through messages or email and I will tell you how much to add to your pledge in order to add tracking. Please understand that International backers are responsible for any customs fees their country may ask for, so be sure to plan accordingly! 
Here is a selection of some of my past pin designs to give you an idea of what the final product quality will look like!  
From sketch to negotiations with the manufacturers, I've seen these designs through the whole process. I pride myself in producing a quality product and providing excellent service! Care for some extra reassurance? Check out my A++ record and read some reviews at my Etsy shop.❤  
Thank you so much for taking the time to read my campaign! Your support of my art in whatever form it takes -- means the world to me. Running this shop is a dream come true and it wouldn't be possible without you. You guys give me the opportunities to do what I am passionate about and create these little worlds of wonder.  
❤ Wanna connect more with me? ❤
If you would like to see sneak peeks of future pin designs and project updates check out the links below! I also love to share my works in progress, stories of hardship and triumph, and overall good-feel posting.  ᕦ(ò_óˇ)ᕤ ♡♡♡
My shop with all our previous designs are also listed here:  
🔮  UnicornPaper.com (opening soon!) 
⭐  Etsy Shop 
🧙  Instagram 
😺  Twitter 
✨  Facebook
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
Before opening Unicorn Paper Company, I worked as a senior designer for 7+ years specializing in merchandise design and production. I have lots of experience in knowing what steps need to be taken to have a smooth product development process. This is also my 4th Kickstarter and I feel very confident in this project and meeting all the goals!

The timeline has some give built into it just in case there are any hiccups during the manufacturing/shipping process. If there are any ‘seconds’ (or defected pins), I will contact the manufacturer promptly to get them replaced. If things appear to be going off-course in anyway, backers will get regular and honest updates of the situation. I strongly believe in an open flow of communication -- so please feel free to contact me at any time with any concerns or questions! I’m most available both on Instagram or by email (UnicornPaperCo@gmail.com)!
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

updates.update_userinfo: Witchy Cats and Friends (part 2 of this series is now live!)
updates.update_content:
Hello old friends! It's been quite the year, hasn't it? I can't believe how quickly time has flown by.
Halloween is one of my favorite holidays/seasons and I knew I would be so sad (even more sad this 2020) if I let the BEST holiday go by without a little spooky joy to celebrate. 
I hope that you guys don't mind me sharing my excitement with you, but I thought that this might be something you'd enjoy! 
My new collection: "Witchy Cats and Friends"  is a love letter to this Witch's Familiar KS from last year.

Time to celebrate once again!! °˖✧◝(⁰▿⁰)◜✧˖° ALL of the stretch goals are  fully funded!!!
Thank you guys SO much!!! ALL of these color variants, and new pins are available to choose from!

campaign.story:
One day, the citizens of Treehollow discovered a small, strange creature wandering alone in Rattleglen Forest. Clearly much too young to be on her own, and with limited verbal communication skills (though she gets by with a little sign language), it’s anyone’s guess how this mysterious being, named Tamberlane, ended up in their care.
Fostered by Belfry, the accident-prone bat with a heart of gold, and guided by a colorful cast of animal characters, Tamberlane’s mysteries continue to unfold. But one question remains on everyone’s mind: who (or more specifically, what) is she?
Chapter 3 Summary
The citizens of Treehollow are preparing to host the region’s annual Sovereign Festival for the first time in 12 years. Belfry and Tess must resolve their fight, and soon, because they have to work a festival booth together. Meanwhile, Oakewood and his godson Milo are deep in the process of learning about Tamberlane, observing her in experimental situations in hopes of getting closer to unlocking the mystery of her origin.
Tamberlane is an ongoing LGBTQIA+ created comic that updates every Wednesday and is rated PG13. Want to try before you buy? Read it here for FREE! 
You’ll love Tamberlane if you also enjoy stories like:
Redwall
The Jungle Book
Wolf Children
Beatrix Potter
The Secret of NIMH
Watership Down
Warrior Cats
Once Upon a Forest
Blacksad
Pogo
Bone
This Kickstarter is to fund the printing and distribution of a gorgeous, perfect-bound full-color book with 80 pages of comic and 10 pages of fan comics and behind-the-scenes concept art!  
Book Specs:
6.9" x 9.8", perfect for your shelf!
100 pages (and maybe more!)
80 lb matte coated interior pages
12pt card matte cover
Perfect (square) binding
Printing will be done by Marquis Books with fulfillment being managed by myself with the help of BackerKit.
While the purpose of this Kickstarter is to get Chapter 3 turned into a book, there’s a lot more Tamberlane goodness I can’t wait to share with you in the form of backer perks and extras! Here’s a description of each tier and the details of the rewards you can look forward to getting by backing this Kickstarter.
 Just the Book: Just the new book of Tamberlane: Chapter 3. ‘Nuff said!
 Signed Book: Your copy of Tamberlane: Chapter 3 will include a signed and numbered bookplate by artist and author, Caytlin Vilbrandt. Plus a print and a sticker! 
 3-Book Set: Copies of Tamberlane: Chapters 1, 2, and 3 in all their beautiful printed glory. Catch up on the whole story so far!
 Signed 3-Book Set: Copies of Tamberlane: Chapters 1, 2, and 3 in book format, with a signed and numbered bookplate in each copy, as well as 1 print and 1 sticker. Collect the whole Tamberlane set! 
 Gimme the Goods Set: A copy of Chapter 3 with a signed and numbered bookplate, including a personalized DOODLE. This is NOT a full sketch, but a quick pen drawing that is nevertheless made just for you! This tier also includes 1 print, 1 sticker, and 3 unlocked Backer Achievement items of your choice!
 [Limit 25] Collector’s Set: Copies of Chapters 1, 2, and 3 in book format, with a signed and numbered bookplate in each copy, one of which has a special, personalized sketch of your two favorite Tamberlane characters! Plus, you’ll get 2 prints, 2 stickers, and one unlocked Backer Achievement item of your choice.  
 [Limit 25] Supporter’s Set:  A copy of just Chapter 3, including a signed and numbered bookplate with  a personalized sketch of your two favorite Tamberlane characters, high  quality Tamberlane-themed canvas tote bag (upgradable to messenger bag if we hit our stretch goal!), plus all available additional merchandise, including stretch goals as they are unlocked. Ideal for past supporters of the comic who already have Chapters 1 and 2, though these books can be purchased a la carte through BackerKit if you’d like the extra goodies.
This Kickstarter is to fund the creation of the Chapter 3 book, which is available to all tiers, but you have the option to get your hands on tangible copies of previous chapters either by pledging to a higher tier or purchasing through BackerKit. Books will be signed only at the tiers specifying as such.  
Keep book thieves away from your comics with signatures and sketches delivered via a special Tamberlane bookplate featuring key characters from the comic! Bookplates will be signed and numbered at all tiers containing signed books, with a limited number of personalized and numbered bookplate sketches being offered split between Collector’s Set and Supporter’s Set tiers. 
Sketch options will go fast, so don’t delay if you’re interested in receiving one-of-a-kind Tamberlane art!
Eligible tiers: Signed Book, Signed 3-Book Set, Collector’s Set, Supporter’s Set  
These stickers are weather-proof, perfect for putting on your car, your laptop, your face, or any other surface your heart desires! Stickers will be available to purchase a la carte through BackerKit, and more designs are unlockable through the Backer Achievements detailed below!
Eligible Tiers: Signed Book, Signed 3-Book Set, Collector’s Set, Supporter’s Set  
 Miniature prints of your favorite Tamberlane characters. Additional print designs will be unlocked as stretch goals are met! Mini prints will be available to purchase a la carte through BackerKit, and more designs are unlockable through the Backer Achievements detailed below!
Eligible tiers: Signed Book, Signed 3-Book Set, Collector’s Set, Supporter’s Set  
For backers at the highest tiers, you’ll get a durable and functional 15" x 16" x 3" canvas tote featuring sketches of Belfry and Tamberlane! Made of sturdy, heavy-duty canvas, this tote bag features a 3" gusset and is perfect for carrying in your groceries, you eco-minded person you! You will have the option to upgrade your canvas tote to a stylish messenger bag or purchase both through BackerKit as stretch goals are unlocked. 
Eligible tiers: Supporter’s Set
Want something your tier doesn't provide? Add-ons featured in this Kickstarter as well as my online store will be available for purchase through BackerKit!
All additional rewards will be available as add-ons through your BackerKit survey when the Kickstarter campaign is over. Be sure to check that support@s.backerkit.com is whitelisted in your email so that you're sure to get the notification of a survey.
 Let’s keep the momentum going with a chance to earn even more backer rewards through stretch goals! Here’s what each milestone will unlock.
UNLOCKED! At $12,000, this awesome Expressions pencil pouch has been unlocked!  A 20x10 cm, waterproof, double-sided pencil pouch featuring a Tamberlane and Belfry sketch pattern. This pencil pouch will be available for purchase through BackerKit.
Eligible tiers: Collector’s Set, Supporter’s Set 

Minty is creating some brand new, breathtaking artwork for this, but in the meantime, her beautiful piece of Nora will serve as a placeholder!
Current WIP of the actual Variant cover!!
At $15,000, a Kickstarter-exclusive variant cover painted by Minty Messerly will be available for all backers! When you complete your BackerKit survey, you will be able to choose whether you want the Variant cover or the Normal cover. Both will be available for purchase through the BackerKit store as well!
Eligible tiers: All of them!
Unlock 5 sketch card designs, which will be printed on a high quality 4"x6" cream cotton heavy cardstock. Each tier with a signed bookplate will receive 1 randomly chosen card design. Full sets of all 5 designs can be purchased through BackerKit.
Eligible tiers: Signed Book, Signed 3-Book Set, Collector’s Set, Supporter’s Set  
Mockup; final product may differ.
For the Supporter’s Set tier, get a high-quality 16" x 11" x 4 1/2" polycanvas messenger bag, featuring a side mesh pocket and lots of useful compartments to store your stuff and sport your love of Tamberlane wherever you go! You can upgrade your Supporter's Set canvas tote to the messenger bag as this is unlocked, or get both through BackerKit. (Even non-Supporter Tier folks!)
Eligible tiers: Supporter’s Set
New for this Kickstarter campaign are ways you can unlock even more rewards by sharing and participating in the Tamberlane community via social media. Be sure to follow Tamberlane on Twitter, Tumblr and Facebook! 
Retweets: 155
Starting August 6th, retweet this tweet advertising the Kickstarter! Retweets only; due to Twitter's limitations, quote tweets (the "Retweet with Comment" option) will not be counted! The digital rewards will be given to all tiers automatically, and will be available to purchase separately in the BackerKit store if you didn't back the campaign. The Retweets counter will be updated once a day in the evening.
Your call has been answered! The first digital reward has opened up, revealing PDFs of each of the comics! These will be automatically added to all tiers, and two digital tiers have opened up: one for just Chapter 3's PDF, and one for all 3 comics as PDFs.
REWARD: The more Retweets our tweet receives, the more excellent digital rewards will open up! 
Shares: 43
Starting August 6th, share this facebook post advertising the Kickstarter! If enough folks share the post, we'll unlock a lovely Expressions pattern on the inside cover of the books! The shares counter will be updated once a day in the evening.
REWARD: All Chapter 3 books will have a patterned interior cover. 

Current: 1,188 (Twitter: 838 | Facebook: 29 | Tumblr: 321)
 Be sure to follow Tamberlane on Twitter, Tumblr and Facebook! The more folks who follow our social media accounts, the more mini prints will be unlocked! These prints will automatically be included as part of the Supporter's Set tier, will be an option for the Collector's Set tier, and will be available for purchase in BackerKit. The Followers counter will be updated once a day in the evening.
REWARD: 1, 2, or 3 extra mini print designs as more folks follow. 
Reached total funding and beyond will unlock 2.5" double-sided clear acrylic keychains featuring your favorite Tamberlane characters! These keychains will automatically be included as part of the Supporter's Set tier, will be an option for the Collector's Set tier, and will be available for purchase in BackerKit. Check the top of the page to see our progress.
First Design UNLOCKED! Our first design is "Goodnight," the same as our stickers! At 2.5", this adorable clear acrylic double-sided keychain is perfect for your bag, cork board, or other assorted keychainable accessories. Bearing a sleepy Belfry on the front and a snoozing Tamberlane on the back, keep them with you at all times for mellow good vibes.
REWARD: 1, 2, or 3 keychain designs as we get more funded. 

For all you pin collectors out there, the more backers this campaign receives will unlock up to 3 1.5" hard enamel pin designs, which will automatically be included as part of the Supporter’s Set tier, an option for the Collector's Set tier, and available for purchase in BackerKit. Check the top of the page to see our progress.
Our first Enamel Pin reward has been UNLOCKED! "Cupcakes" is an adorable 1.25" enamel pin of Belfry holding a pile of cupcakes! She has antiqued bronze plating on the metal to contrast with her bright fur, and they're hard enamel -- meaning that the color is even with the metal!
Our second Enamel Pin reward is UNLOCKED! "Animal" is an adorable 1.25" enamel pin of Tamberlane making the Trissol/sign language sign for "animal"! With gold plating on the metal outlines and a playfully fierce expression, she's sure to adorn your lapels and your heart!
REWARD: 1, 2, or 3 enamel pin designs as backer count grows.  
Total Stories: 3
Tell stories on social media about how Tamberlane has impacted you. Use the #Tamberlane hashtag for it to count toward this goal! You get an extra entry if you include a photo of yourself with something Tamberlane-related, be it merchandise, art, or just a handwritten note of support! Posts to the #Tamberlane tag that aren't about how it impacted you don't count!
If it’s not on Twitter, please share the link with the @TamberlaneComic Twitter account or via email tamberfan@gmail.com. Please keep all posts rated PG and below. For each milestone we hit, a new sticker design unlocks! These stickers will be automatically added to the Supporter's Tier, will be an option for the Collector's Tier, and will be available for puchase a la carte in the BackerKit store.
The entries counter will be updated once a day in the evening.
REWARD: 1, 2, or 3 extra sticker designs. 
So to summarize, here's how you can help:
Back the Kickstarter
Retweet the tweet and post the Facebook post
Share your stories about how Tamberlane affected your life in the #Tamberlane hashtag
Participate in the #TamberlaneAndMe fanworks contest
Follow the comic social media accounts (see below)
Tell your friends about the comic & this kickstarter
Read the comic
Tamberlane is entirely made possible thanks to readers like you. Here are other ways you can support the creation of the comic!
Patreon | Shop | Read the Comic and Share | Buy Me a Coffee
Follow on  Twitter | Tumblr | Facebook | Twitch | Youtube
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
The comic is already done, the files are already completed, and I have ample experience in crowdfunding, having successfully finished 6 previous campaigns. I've also been successfully fulfilling orders for my online shop and Patreon, I've got a streamlined fulfillment process, and a handful of helpers to get through it all.

However, there is always a risk with a crowdfunding project. As I'm hoping to have the books in my hands, fulfilled, and ready to sell before GeekGirlCon (November 16-17 in Seattle!), the turnaround is very tight. My aim is to be sure the rewards are in the mail before I head out to vend, but that may not be possible if there are delays. I've tried to build in a bit of a time buffer, but it's still tighter than I’d like!

In addition, my health goes up and down. I struggle with chronic pain and fatigue that can sometimes kill my ability to work for days at a time. If it strikes at the wrong time, fulfillment may be delayed. Plus, manufacturers can sometimes take longer than I anticipated.

But for all of that, as long as this kickstarter is funded, there is zero possibility it will not be fulfilled. I'm a hard worker with a proven track record. If you back this Kickstarter, you're backing a safe bet.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

updates.update_content: Hello from the sea of boxes that is my house!

Hello all! I know it's been a little bit since the last update so I wanted to let you all know what's going on!
Status: Everything has arrived except the books, which should be coming, hopefully, next week. All pins have been assembled on backing cards and placed in plant-based wrappers. 90% of the keychains have similarly been assembled and packaged. I have 13 book sketches left to do!
The first products are comin' in! And the verdict says... STICKERS!
The book is ready for printing! PDFs should be distributed shortly via BackerKit. Yay!

updates.update_userinfo: Fill Out Your Survey by September 18th!
updates.update_content:
Hey all! Just a reminder to fill out your survey before the 18th! The surveys were sent out through BackerKit and if you can't find the email, you should be able to get to your survey by putting in your Kickstarter email here:
http://tamberlane3.backerkit.com
If you do not get your survey in by September 18th, your name will not be in the book and your order will be fulfilled last.

Oh my gosh you guys! We DID IT! The Kickstarter went over $20k, and beat the Ch2 Kickstarter even though I dropped the price of the books this time around. That's AMAZING. 
As promised, since we hit $20k, we've got the sketch cards!!

Wow!! We made it to $18k last night while I slept! We've got less than 24 hours left now and just a bit over $1k left to get to the sketch cards!!
And speaking of sketch cards, here's the 4th sketch card design!
